<section.body>
<form uuid="Ifaf5be40e5f711e5a0aaed05177ff52b">
<form.unit>
<form.para>
<form.text>Sec. 1.0 Public places.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|49|40:36.80">
<form.text>As used in this article, the following words and terms shall have the meanings set forth in this Section:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|49|40:36.80">
<form.text>City facility or facilities: All buildings and/or structures owned or operated by or under the control of the city.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|49|40:36.80">
<form.text>Electronic cigarette or electronic vaping device means any electronically, battery or mechanically powered device that uses an atomizer or similar device allowing users to inhale nicotine vapor, or any other vapor, to simulate the smoking of tobacco, cigarettes, pipes or cigars. An electronic vaping device includes personal vaporizers, electronic cigarettes (e-cigarettes), electronic pipes (e-pipes), electronic cigars (e-cigars), and any other type of electronic nicotine or vapor delivery system, or any part thereof.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|49|40:36.80">
<form.text>Smoke or Smoking means the carrying, possessing or holding of any cigar, cigarette, pipe, tobacco product, electronic cigarette or e-cigarette or liquid nicotine of any kind, which is burning or emitting a vapor or the exhalation of any smoke or vapor produced from any cigar, cigarette, pipe, tobacco product, electronic cigarette or e-cigarette.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(a)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|49|40:36.80">
<form.text>A person commits an offense if the person intentionally or knowingly smokes in a city facility.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(b)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|49|40:36.80">
<form.text>Any person violating any provision of this section shall be punished as prescribed by section <inline.instr>__lsqb__specification of code reference__rsqb__</inline.instr> of the Code of Ordinances of the city.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|49|40:36.80">
<form.text>Signs shall be visibly placed at or near a public entrance to city facilities to notify persons entering the premises that smoking is prohibited.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.para>
<form.text>Sec. 2 Restaurants.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|49|40:36.80">
<form.text>As used in this article, the following words and terms shall have the meanings set forth in this Section:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|49|40:36.80">
<form.text>Bar means an establishment which has more than seventy (70) percent of its annual gross sales in alcoholic beverages and which is devoted to the serving of alcoholic beverages for consumption by guests on the premises and in which the serving of food is only incidental to the consumption of such beverages and where minors are not allowed admittance unless accompanied by a parent or legal guardian. Restaurants that contain a bar are not considered a “bar” because minors are admitted in these areas.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|49|40:36.80">
<form.text>Dining area means any area in which meals or entrees are served, but shall not include areas where the incidental service of hors d'oeuvres, snacks, pretzels, popcorn, or similar items are provided.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|49|40:36.80">
<form.text>Electronic cigarette or electronic vaping device means any electronically, battery or mechanically powered device that uses an atomizer or similar device allowing users to inhale nicotine vapor, or any other vapor, to simulate the smoking of tobacco, cigarettes, pipes or cigars. An electronic vaping device includes personal vaporizers, electronic cigarettes (e-cigarettes), electronic pipes (e-pipes), electronic cigars (e-cigars), and any other type of electronic nicotine or vapor delivery system, or any part thereof.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|49|40:36.80">
<form.text>Enclosed means closed in on all sides by smoke impermeable walls or windows (exclusive of doorways) that extend from the floor to the ceiling.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|49|40:36.80">
<form.text>Minor means any person under eighteen (18) years of age.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|49|40:36.80">
<form.text>Restaurant means any place where food is manufactured, packaged, produced, processed, transported, stored, sold, commercially prepared, vended, or otherwise handled. The term includes any such place regardless of the duration of the permit or whether there is a charge for the food. The term includes, but is not limited to, a coffee shop, cafeteria, sandwich shop, private or public school cafeteria, and any other eating establishment that gives or offers food to the public, guests or employees, including catering facilities.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|49|40:36.80">
<form.text>Smoke or Smoking means the carrying, possessing or holding of any cigar, cigarette, pipe, tobacco product, electronic cigarette or e-cigarette or liquid nicotine of any kind, which is burning or emitting a vapor or the exhalation of any smoke or vapor produced from any cigar, cigarette, pipe, tobacco product, electronic cigarette or e-cigarette.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|49|40:36.80">
<form.text>Nothing in this chapter excuses non compliance with any state or federal law, provisions of this Code, any other applicable ordinance of the city, or any rule or regulation adopted pursuant thereto, which prohibits smoking.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|49|40:36.80">
<form.text>A person commits an offense if <inline.instr>__lsqb__he/she__rsqb__</inline.instr>:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(1)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|49|40:36.80">
<form.text>Knowingly smokes in the enclosed dining area of a restaurant;</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(2)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|49|40:36.80">
<form.text>Fails to have prominently displayed a no-smoking sign as required by this chapter; or</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(3)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|49|40:36.80">
<form.text>Is the owner, lessee or other person in charge of a restaurant and knowingly or intentionally permits or fails to make a reasonable effort to prevent commission by another of the offense described in subsection (1) of this Section.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|49|40:36.80">
<form.text>The owner, lessee or other person in charge of a restaurant shall post a clearly visible sign with the words “SMOKING IS PROHIBITED BY CITY ORDINANCE” at each entrance to the restaurant. Additionally, signs displaying the universal symbol for no smoking, or other language that clearly indicates that smoking is prohibited, shall be posted within the restaurant.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|49|40:36.80">
<form.text>The provisions of Section 2.2 of this chapter shall not apply to a cocktail lounge, tavern or other facility that constitutes a “bar” as defined in Section 1.2 of this chapter.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.para>
<form.text>Sec. 3 Minors.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|49|40:36.80">
<form.text>As used in this article, the following words and terms shall have the meanings set forth in this section:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|49|40:36.80">
<form.text>Electronic cigarette or electronic vaping device means any electronically, battery or mechanically powered device that uses an atomizer or similar device allowing users to inhale nicotine vapor, or any other vapor, to simulate the smoking of tobacco, cigarettes, pipes or cigars. An electronic vaping device includes personal vaporizers, electronic cigarettes (e-cigarettes), electronic pipes (e-pipes), electronic cigars (e-cigars), and any other type of electronic nicotine or vapor delivery system, or any part thereof.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|49|40:36.80">
<form.text>Minor means any person under eighteen (18) years of age.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|49|40:36.80">
<form.text>Open display unit as used in this article shall mean, in the context of the retail sale of electronic cigarettes, e-cigarettes or liquid nicotine, any device, furniture or furnishing within or upon which electronic cigarettes, e-cigarettes or liquid nicotine are displayed to customers, and includes, but is not limited to, any case, rack, shelf, counter, table, desk, kiosk, booth, stand, vending machine and other surface.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|49|40:36.80">
<form.text>Possess(es), possessing or possession means actual care, custody, control or management.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|49|40:36.80">
<form.text>Retailer means a person, place of business or retail and service establishment, who/which engages in the practice of selling cigarettes, tobacco products, electronic cigarettes or e-cigarettes and/or liquid nicotine to consumers and includes, without limitation, the owner of an open display unit.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|49|40:36.80">
<form.text>Self-service merchandising means, in the context of the retail sale of electronic cigarettes, e-cigarettes or liquid nicotine, the open display, including, without limitation, the use of an open display unit of electronic cigarettes, e-cigarettes or liquid nicotine, whether packaged or otherwise, for direct retail customer access and handling prior to purchase without the intervention of assistance of the retailer or the retailer's owner, employee or agent.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|49|40:36.80">
<form.text>Smoke or Smoking means the carrying, possessing or holding of any cigar, cigarette, pipe, tobacco product, electronic cigarette or e-cigarette or liquid nicotine of any kind, which is burning or emitting a vapor or the exhalation of any smoke or vapor produced from any cigar, cigarette, pipe, tobacco product, electronic cigarette or e-cigarette.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(a)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|49|40:36.80">
<form.text>A minor commits an offense if they:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(1)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|49|40:36.80">
<form.text>Possesses, purchases, consumes or accepts an electronic cigarette, e-cigarette, or liquid nicotine; or falsely represents himself or herself to be 18 years of age or older by displaying proof of age that is false, fraudulent, or not actually proof of the individual's own age in order to obtain possession of, purchase, or receive an electronic cigarette, e-cigarette, or liquid nicotine.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(b)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(1)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|49|40:36.80">
<form.text>It shall be a defense to prosecution of a violation of this section if the minor possessed the electronic cigarette, e-cigarette or liquid nicotine in the presence of:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>I</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|49|40:36.80">
<form.text>An employer of the minor, if possession or receipt of the electronic cigarette, e-cigarette or liquid nicotine is required in the performance of the employee's duties as an employee; or</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|49|40:36.80">
<form.text>An adult parent, a guardian, or a spouse of the minor.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(2)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|49|40:36.80">
<form.text>It shall be a defense to prosecution of a violation of this Section if the minor was participating in an inspection or test of compliance in conjunction with local law enforcement.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(a)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|49|40:36.80">
<form.text>A person commits an offense if the person, with criminal negligence:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(i)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|49|40:36.80">
<form.text>Sells, gives, or causes to be sold or given an electronic cigarette, e-cigarette, or liquid nicotine to a minor; or</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(ii)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|49|40:36.80">
<form.text>Sells, gives, or causes to be sold or given an electronic cigarette, e-cigarette, or liquid nicotine to another person who intends to deliver it to someone who is a minor.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(b)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|49|40:36.80">
<form.text>If an offense under this Section occurs in connection with a sale by an employee of the owner of a store in which electronic cigarettes, e-cigarettes, or liquid nicotine are sold at retail, the employee is criminally responsible for the offense and is subject to prosecution.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(c)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|49|40:36.80">
<form.text>It is a defense to prosecution under Subsection (a)(l) that the person to whom the electronic cigarette, e-cigarette, or liquid nicotine was sold or given presented apparently valid proof of identification to the defendant.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(d)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|49|40:36.80">
<form.text>A proof of identification satisfies the requirements of Subsection (c) if it contains a physical description and photograph consistent with the person's appearance, purports to establish that the person is 18 years of age or older, and was issued by a governmental agency. The proof of identification may include a driver's license issued by this state or another state, a passport, or an identification card issued by a state or the federal government.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(a)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|49|40:36.80">
<form.text>Except as provided by Subsection (b), a retailer or other person may not:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(1)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|49|40:36.80">
<form.text>Offer electronic cigarettes, e-cigarettes or liquid nicotine for sale in a manner that permits a customer direct access to the electronic cigarettes, e-cigarettes or liquid nicotine;</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(2)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|49|40:36.80">
<form.text>Offer for sale or display for sale electronic cigarettes, e-cigarettes or liquid nicotine by means of self-service merchandising; or</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(3)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|49|40:36.80">
<form.text>Install or maintain an open display unit containing electronic cigarettes, e-cigarettes or liquid nicotine.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(b)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|49|40:36.80">
<form.text>It is a defense to prosecution under subsection (a) if:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(1)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|49|40:36.80">

</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>

</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|49|40:36.80">
<form.text>A facility or business is a premises for which a person holds a package store permit issued under the Alcoholic Beverage Code; or</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(3)</designator>
</name.block>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
</form.unit>

</form.unit>
</para>

<section>
<section.front>
<outline.name.block>
<label>&sect;</label>
<designator>40:36.90</designator>
<name>Electronic cigarettes, merchandising</name>
</outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>FVC</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>AMT</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>LGV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>LIC</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>LUV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>ORD</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="Ifaf63370e5f711e5a0aaed05177ff52b">
<form.unit>
<form.para>
<form.text>Sec. 1-1 &mdash;Intent.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|50|40:36.90">
<form.text>p.fl="none">The provisions of this article are intended to prevent the sale and possession of tobacco products by persons under the age of 18, and the sale of electronic cigarettes and like products to persons under the age of 18, by regulating the commercial marketing and placement of such products; and further by restricting the use of electronic cigarettes. It is not the intent of this article to prohibit the sale or delivery of tobacco products which are otherwise lawful or regulated pursuant to <inline.instr>__lsqb__specification of code reference__rsqb__</inline.instr>, and this article shall not be interpreted or construed to do so.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>Sec. 1-2 &mdash;Definitions.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|50|40:36.90">
<form.text>p.fl="none">The following words, terms, and phrases when used in this article, shall have the following meanings set forth in this section, except where the context clearly indicates a different meaning:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|50|40:36.90">
<form.text>p.fl="none">Business means any sole proprietorship, joint venture, corporation or other business formed for profit making or non profit purposes, including retail establishments where goods or services are sold.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|50|40:36.90">
<form.text>p.fl="none">E-cigarette means an electronic cigarette, as hereafter defined.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|50|40:36.90">
<form.text>p.fl="none">Electronic cigarette means any electronic device composed of a mouthpiece, heating element, battery and electronic circuits, that provides a vapor of liquid nicotine and/or other substances mixed with propylene glycol or other chemicals, to the user that he or she inhales in simulation of smoking. This term shall include such devices whether they are manufactured as electronic cigarettes, e-cigarettes, e-cigars, e-pipes or under any other product name.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|50|40:36.90">
<form.text>p.fl="none">Employee shall mean any person who employed by any employer in consideration for direct or indirect monetary wages or profits.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|50|40:36.90">
<form.text>p.fl="none">Employer shall mean any person who employs the services of an individual person.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|50|40:36.90">
<form.text>p.fl="none">Liquid nicotine means any liquid product composed either in whole or in part of pure nicotine and propylene glycol or other chemicals, and manufactured for use with e-cigarettes.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|50|40:36.90">
<form.text>p.fl="none">Person means any individual, employee, partnership, private or closely held corporation, cooperative association, personal representative, receiver, trustee, assignee, or other legal entity.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|50|40:36.90">
<form.text>p.fl="none">Self-service merchandising means the open display of tobacco products, e-cigarettes or liquid nicotine, whether packaged or otherwise, to which the public has access without the intervention of the vendor, store owner, or other store employee. Self-service merchandising also includes open display units, which are in a case, rack, shelf, counter, table, desk, kiosk, booth, stand, or other surface which allows direct public access to the product placed therein.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|50|40:36.90">
<form.text>p.fl="none">Smoke or smoking shall mean the intake and exhalation by a person of smoke from tobacco, a tobacco substitute or other weed or plant, and also possessing, carrying, holding or otherwise having control of a lighted pipe, cigar, cigarette or other lighted smoking equipment.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|50|40:36.90">
<form.text>p.fl="none">Tobacco products include loose tobacco leaves, and products made from tobacco leaves in whole or in part, and cigarette wrappers, which can be used for smoking, sniffing or chewing.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|50|40:36.90">
<form.text>p.fl="none">Tobacco retailer means any person or business that operates a store, stand, booth, concession or other place at which sales of tobacco products are made to purchasers for consumption of or use.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|50|40:36.90">
<form.text>p.fl="none">Use of an e-cigarette means the heating or ignition of an e-cigarette which creates a vapor of liquid nicotine and/or other substances mixed with propylene glycol or other chemicals, to the user that he or she can inhale in simulation of smoking.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|50|40:36.90">
<form.text>p.fl="none">Vendor assisted means the customer has no access to tobacco products without the assistance of the vendor, store owner, or other employee.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>Sec. 1-3 &mdash;Self-service merchandising activities prohibited.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(a)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|50|40:36.90">
<form.text>No person, business, employer, tobacco retailer or other establishment subject to this article shall sell, permit to be sold, offer for sale or display for sale any tobacco products, e-cigarettes or any liquid product composed either in whole or in part of pure nicotine by means of self-service merchandising or any other means other than vendor assisted sales, unless access to the premises by persons under the age of 18 is prohibited by the person, business, tobacco retailer or other establishment or prohibited by law.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(b)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|50|40:36.90">
<form.text>No person, business, tobacco retailer or other establishment within incorporated (city limits) City of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of city__rsqb__</inline.instr> shall sell, permit to be sold, or offer for sale, e-cigarettes, or any liquid product composed either in whole or in part of pure nicotine to a person under the age of 18.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(c)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|50|40:36.90">
<form.text>No person, business, tobacco retailer or other establishment shall place e-cigarettes or any liquid product composed either in whole or in part of pure nicotine in an open display unit unless the same is inaccessible to customers.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.para>
<form.text>Sec. 1-4 &mdash;Use in certain areas prohibited.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|50|40:36.90">
<form.text>p.fl="none">The use of an e-cigarette is prohibited in all locations within the incorporated area (city limits) of the City of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of city__rsqb__</inline.instr> at which smoking is prohibited under the <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of state__rsqb__</inline.instr> Clean Indoor Air Act, Ch. 386, Part II, <st>F.S. &dblsect;386.201 to 386.2125, (2012).</st></form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>Sec. 1-5 &mdash;Enforcement.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(a)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|50|40:36.90">
<form.text>The provisions of this article shall be enforced by Code Enforcement Officers of the City of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of city__rsqb__</inline.instr> Code Enforcement Department or the City of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of city__rsqb__</inline.instr> Police Department. Tobacco product enforcement officers may be appointed by the City Commission of the City of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of city__rsqb__</inline.instr> pursuant to <inline.instr>__lsqb__specification of code reference__rsqb__</inline.instr>.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(b)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|50|40:36.90">
<form.text>As an alternative to the procedures specified under subsection (a), above, the City of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of city__rsqb__</inline.instr>, through the city attorney may bring a civil action in any court of competent jurisdiction to enforce or administer this article, including seeking a temporary or permanent injunction, or appointment of a receiver when it has reasonable cause to believe that a business, person, or tobacco retailer is operating in violation of this article. The City Commission of the City of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of city__rsqb__</inline.instr> shall be entitled to an award of costs and reasonable attorney's fees, including appellate fees and costs, in an action successfully enforcing the terms of this article.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.para>
<form.text>Sec. 1-6 &mdash;Penalties.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|50|40:36.90">
<form.text>p.fl="none">The violation of any provision of this article shall be punished as follows:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(1)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|50|40:36.90">
<form.text>The first violation shall result in a warning with each subsequent violation punished by a fine not to exceed $<inline.instr>__lsqb__dollar amount of fine__rsqb__</inline.instr> or by imprisonment in the county jail not to exceed 60 days, or by both such fine and imprisonment.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(2)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|50|40:36.90">

</form.para>

<section>
<section.front>
<outline.name.block>
<label>&sect;</label>
<designator>40:39</designator>
<name>Non smoking areas required in workplaces and public places</name>
</outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>FMS</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>LGV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>ORD</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="I43fef0f02f4f11e3947f0000837bc6dd">
<form.unit>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 1.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|54|40:39">
<form.text>SHORT TITLE. This ordinance shall be known as the Smoking Pollution Control Ordinance.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 2.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|54|40:39">
<form.text>PURPOSE. Because the smoking of tobacco or any other weed or plant is a cause of material annoyance and discomfort to those who are present in confined places and is a danger to their health, the city hereby declares that the purposes of this ordinance are (1) to protect the public health and welfare by regulating smoking in the office workplace and (2) to minimize the toxic effects of smoking in an office workplace by requiring an employer to adopt a policy that will accommodate, insofar as possible, the preferences of non smokers and smokers and, if a satisfactory accommodation cannot be reached, to prohibit smoking in an office workplace.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|54|40:39">
<form.text>This ordinance is not intended to create any right to smoke or to impair, or alter an employer's prerogative to prohibit smoking in the workplace. Rather, if an employer allows employees to smoke in the workplace, then this ordinance requires (1) that the employer make accommodations for the preferences of both non smoking and smoking employees, and (2) if a satisfactory accommodation to all affected non smoking employee cannot be reached, that the employer prohibit smoking in the office workplace.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 3.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|54|40:39">
<form.text>DEFINITIONS. As used in this ordinance, the following terms shall have the following meanings, unless the context clearly indicates that a different meaning is intended:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|54|40:39">
<form.text>City council: The city council of the City of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of city__rsqb__</inline.instr>.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|54|40:39">
<form.text>Employee: Any person who is employed by any employer in consideration for direct or indirect monetary wages or profit.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|54|40:39">
<form.text>Employer: Any person who employs the services of an individual person.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|54|40:39">
<form.text>Enclosed: Closed in by a roof and four walls with appropriate openings for ingress and egress and is not intended to mean areas commonly described as public lobbies or halls.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|54|40:39">
<form.text>Office workplace: Any enclosed area of a structure or portion thereof intended for occupancy by business entities which will provide primarily clerical, writing computer operation, professional or business services of the business entity, or which will provide primarily clerical, writing, computer operation, professional or business services to other business entities or the public at that location. Office workplace includes, but is not limited to, such spaces in office buildings, medical office waiting rooms, libraries, museums, hospitals and nursing homes.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|54|40:39">
<form.text>Person: Any individual person, firm, partnership, association, corporation, company, organization or legal entity of any kind.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|54|40:39">
<form.text>Smoke-free: Free of visible smoke, and not containing fumes and odors from smoking in sufficient concentrations to cause annoyance or distress to any non smoker working in that work space.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|54|40:39">
<form.text>Smoking or to smoke: Inhaling, exhaling, burning or carrying any lighted smoking equipment for tobacco or any other weed or plant.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 4.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|54|40:39">
<form.text>REGULATION OF SMOKING&mdash;OFFICE WORKPLACES.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(1)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|54|40:39">
<form.text>Each employer who operates, an office or offices in the city shall within three months of the adoption of this ordinance, adopt, implement and maintain a written smoking policy which shall contain, at a minimum, the following provisions and requirements:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(a)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|54|40:39">
<form.text>Any non smoking employee may object to his or her employer about smoke in his or her workplace. Using already available means of ventilation or separation or partition of office space, the employer shall attempt to arrange an environment in which the location or locations where the non smoker works is smoke-free.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(b)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|54|40:39">
<form.text>If an arrangement complying with paragraph (a), above, cannot be reached in any given office workplace, the employer shall prohibit smoking in that office workplace. Where the employer prohibits smoking in an office workplace, the area in which smoking is prohibited shall be clearly marked with signs.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(2)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|54|40:39">
<form.text>The smoking policy established by this ordinance shall be announced within three weeks of adoption to all employees working in office workplaces in the city and posted conspicuously in all workplaces under the employer's jurisdiction.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 5.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|54|40:39">
<form.text>SMOKING PROHIBITED IN CERTAIN PLACES. No person shall smoke in any of the following areas:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(a)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|54|40:39">
<form.text>Those portions of any building, structure or other enclosed facility open to the general public for the primary purpose of exhibiting any motion picture, stage production, musical recital, or similar performance, exclusive of sports events, other than in an area which serves as a lobby.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(b)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|54|40:39">
<form.text>Any room, chamber, place of meeting or public assembly wherein public business is being conducted and which is open to members of the general public either as participants or as spectators, except that the prohibition contained in this subparagraph shall not apply within a contiguous area containing 50% or less of the room, chamber or place of meeting or public assembly, if the entity having management and control of the premises has designated and identified such area as a Smoking Permitted Area by appropriate signs, provided that no division of that area of such room, chamber, place of meeting or public assembly set aside for use by the general public shall be made on a front area versus rear area basis, and further provided that where such premises as above provided have a seating capacity of fewer than 50 seats, that the contiguous area to be set aside for use as a Smoking Permitted Area by the entity having management and control of the premises, shall be 25% or less of the total area set aside for use by the general public.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(c)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|54|40:39">
<form.text>Those areas within the buildings or structures of any health care facility which are open to visitors to the premises, except that in such areas there may be enclosed areas designated and set aside on each floor, where smoking may be allowed.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(d)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|54|40:39">
<form.text>Any retail food marketing establishments, including grocery stores and supermarkets, except areas not open to the public which areas are subject to those provisions of this ordinance relating to places of employment.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(e)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|54|40:39">
<form.text>Any retail store or shop, except for those parts of the premises that are not open to the public. The parts, that are not open to the public but are used by employees shall be subject to the provisions of this ordinance relating to places of employment.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 6.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|54|40:39">
<form.text>RESTAURANTS. In any restaurant, cafeteria, coffee shop or other place where food is sold for consumption on the premises, the management or person in charge shall designate not less than one-half of the area where food is consumed as a non smoking area. The designation may be made either by signs of by orally informing customers of the non smoking areas. No persons shall smoke in any non smoking area designated in accordance with this section.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 7.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|54|40:39">
<form.text>OTHER PLACES OF EMPLOYMENT. The following restrictions shall apply to all places of employment except those specifically regulated in Section 4 and those specifically regulated in Section 5 of this ordinance:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(a)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|54|40:39">
<form.text>Within 120 days of the effective date of this ordinance, each employer shall adopt, implement and maintain a written smoking policy which shall contain, at a minimum, provisions related to the following:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(1)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|54|40:39">
<form.text>The prohibition of smoking in restrooms, elevators and nurses aid stations or similar facilities for treatment of employees.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(2)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|54|40:39">
<form.text>The provision and maintenance of a contiguous non smoking area of not less than two-thirds of the seating capacity and floor space in cafeterias, lunchrooms, and employee lounges.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(3)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|54|40:39">
<form.text>A statement providing that in any dispute arising between smokers and non smokers, efforts shall be made by the employer to accommodate the desires of both smokers and non smokers.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|54|40:39">
<form.text>It shall be the responsibility of employers to provide smoke-free work areas for non smokers to the maximum extent possible, but employers are not required to incur any expense to make structural or other physical modifications in providing these areas. An employer who makes reasonable efforts to develop and promulgate a policy regarding smoking and non smoking in the workplace shall be deemed to be in compliance with this paragraph, provided that a policy which designates an entire workplace as a smoking area shall not be deemed in compliance with this paragraph.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(4)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|54|40:39">
<form.text>An employer shall post “No Smoking” signs in any area designated as a non smoking area.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(b)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|54|40:39">
<form.text>The smoking policy shall be communicated in writing to all current employees within three weeks of the date of adoption, and to all future employees at the time of their entry into employment.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(c)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|54|40:39">
<form.text>Notwithstanding the above, every employer shall have the authority to designate any work area as a non smoking area.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(d)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|54|40:39">
<form.text>No person shall smoke in any non smoking area designated by an employer in accordance with this ordinance.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 8.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|54|40:39">
<form.text>SIGNS AND ANNOUNCEMENTS REQUIRED. The person having the authority to manage and control any area designated as a non smoking area pursuant to Sections 5 or 7 of this ordinance, shall post or cause to be posted and prominently displayed, and shall maintain “No Smoking” signs in conspicuous locations within those areas. All such signs shall clearly and conspicuously recite the phrase “NO SMOKING” or use the international no-smoking symbol. The signs shall be posted not less than five feet, nor more than eight feet, above floor level and shall be of sufficient number and location to cause the message of at least one of the signs to be clearly visible, legible, and readable. Provided, however, that in any such location, the person in charge may orally inform all persons using the area of the non smoking regulations, in lieu of posting signs.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 9.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|54|40:39">
<form.text>OTHER AGENCIES. Federal, state, county, school and special districts officials are urged to enact and enforce provisions similar to the provision contained here. Copies of this ordinance shall be furnished to such officials by the city health officer.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 10.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|54|40:39">
<form.text>COMPLIANCE. Each employer and other person in charge of any non smoking area designated by this ordinance shall take steps to cause all persons using the premises to comply with this ordinance. Such steps may include, but are not limited to, directing any person who is smoking to cease smoking, directing any person failing to cease smoking to leave the non smoking area, and in the case of smoking employees, taking appropriate disciplinary action for repeated willful violations.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 11.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|54|40:39">
<form.text>SMOKING IN VIOLATION OF ORDINANCE. Any person persisting in smoking in violation of this ordinance after an oral or written warning to cease smoking, may be prosecuted for violating this ordinance. Failure to post signs, and failure to provide an earlier oral warning shall not excuse continuing to smoke after a warning.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 12.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.unit>
</para>
</form>
</section.body>
</section>

<form.para>
<form.text>Section 1.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|55|40:40">
<form.text>FINDINGS AND STATEMENT OF POLICY.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(a)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|55|40:40">
<form.text>The smoking of tobacco or weeds or other plant products has been demonstrated to have a detrimental effect on not only the smoker but others in close proximity to the smoker.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(b)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|55|40:40">
<form.text>It is the right of citizens to be able to choose for themselves whether to smoke either actively or passively.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(c)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|55|40:40">
<form.text>It is the policy of this city to encourage food product establishments which have enclosed dining areas to provide adequate seating for those patrons who prefer a smoke-free environment.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(d)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|55|40:40">
<form.text>Many citizens of the city have demonstrated a desire to comply voluntarily with city ordinances which protect public health and welfare.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 2.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|55|40:40">
<form.text>DEFINITIONS. As used in this ordinance, the following terms shall have the following meanings, unless the context clearly indicates that a different meaning is intended:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>

<designator>(a)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|55|40:40">
<form.text>Administrative Area: The area of an establishment not generally accessible to the public, including but not limited to individual offices, stockrooms, employee lounges or meeting rooms.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>

</name.block>

</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>

</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|55|40:40">

</name.block>

<form.text>Section 3.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|55|40:40">
<form.text>SMOKING PROHIBITED IN CERTAIN PUBLIC AREAS.</form.text>

<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(a)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|55|40:40">
<form.text>A person commits an offense if he or she smokes or possesses a burning tobacco, weed or other plant product in any of the following indoor or enclosed areas:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(1)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|55|40:40">

</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(2)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|55|40:40">
<form.text>A hospital or nursing home corridor providing direct access to patients' rooms;</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(3)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|55|40:40">
<form.text>Any conference room, meeting room, or public service area of any facility owned, operated or managed by the city, but not including the city convention center and common areas of city-owned theaters, of concert halls or of cultural facilities;</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(4)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|55|40:40">
<form.text>Any retail or service establishment serving the general public, including but not limited to any department store, grocery store or drugstore, and including the city airport, the city convention center and common areas of city-owned theaters, of concert halls and of cultural facilities;</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(5)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|55|40:40">
<form.text>An area marked with a no-smoking sign in accordance with paragraph (b) by the owner or person in control of a hospital, nursing home, or retail or service establishment serving the general public; or</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(6)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|55|40:40">
<form.text>Any facility of a public primary or secondary school; or an enclosed theater, movie house, library, museum or transit system vehicle.</form.text>

</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(b)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|55|40:40">
<form.text>The owner or person in control of an establishment or area designated in paragraph (a) of this section shall post a conspicuous sign at the main entrance to the establishment. The sign shall contain the words “No Smoking, City Ordinance,” the universal symbol for no smoking or other language that clearly prohibits smoking.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(c)</designator>
</name.block>

<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(1)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|55|40:40">

<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(2)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|55|40:40">

</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(d)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|55|40:40">
<form.text>The owner or person in control of an establishment or area described in subparagraphs (a)(4) or (a)(6) may designate an area, including but not limited to lobbies, meeting rooms or waiting rooms, as a smoking area provided that the designated smoking area may not include:</form.text>

</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(3)</designator>

<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|55|40:40">

<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|55|40:40">
<form.text>It is a defense to prosecution under this section if the person was smoking in a location that was.</form.text>

<form.item>

<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|55|40:40">

</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|55|40:40">

<form.text>Section 5.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|55|40:40">
<form.text>RESTAURANTS.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(a)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|55|40:40">
<form.text>A restaurant which has indoor or enclosed dining areas shall provide separate indoor or enclosed dining areas for smoking and non smoking patrons.</form.text>

<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(b)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|55|40:40">
<form.text>A non smoking area must:</form.text>

</name.block>

<form.item>

</name.block>

</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(4)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|55|40:40">
<form.text>Have ashtrays or other suitable containers for extinguishing smoking materials at the perimeter of the non smoking area.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(c)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|55|40:40">
<form.text>Each restaurant shall:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(1)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|55|40:40">

</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(2)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|55|40:40">

</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(3)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|55|40:40">
<form.text>Have signs at the establishment's entrance indicating that non smoking seating is available.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(d)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|55|40:40">
<form.text>Non dining areas of any restaurant affected by this section to which patrons have general access including, but not limited to, food order areas, food services areas, restrooms and cashier areas shall be designated as non smoking areas.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(e)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|55|40:40">
<form.text>It is a defense to prosecution under this section that the restaurant is:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(1)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|55|40:40">
<form.text>An establishment which has more than 70% of its annual gross sales in alcoholic beverages; or</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(2)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|55|40:40">
<form.text>A physically separated bar area of an establishment otherwise regulated.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 6.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|55|40:40">
<form.text>SMOKING IN RESTAURANTS. A person commits an offense if he or she smokes or possesses a burning tobacco, weed or other plant product in an area of a restaurant designated as a non smoking area by this ordinance.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 7.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|55|40:40">
<form.text>SEVERABILITY. The provisions of this ordinance are severable. If any provision of this ordinance or the application thereof to any person or circumstance is held invalid, such invalidity shall not affect other provisions or applications of this ordinance which can be given effect without the invalid provision or application.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 8.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.unit>
</para>
</form>
</section.body>
</section>

</outline.name.block>
