<form.para>
<form.text>Section 1.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|20|40:14">
<form.text>Definitions</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|20|40:14">
<form.text>“Private Club” as used in this section means any nonprofit association organized under the laws of this State which:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(a)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|20|40:14">
<form.text>Has been in existence at least one year prior to the filing of its application for a license to be issued pursuant to this chapter;</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(b)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|20|40:14">
<form.text>Has at least 75 regular dues-paying members;</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(c)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|20|40:14">
<form.text>Owns, hires, or leases a building or space within a building for the reasonable use of its members and guests with:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(1)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|20|40:14">
<form.text>Suitable kitchen and dining room space and equipment; and</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(2)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|20|40:14">
<form.text>A sufficient number of staff Employees for cooking, preparing, and serving meals for its members and guests; and</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(3)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|20|40:14">
<form.text>Has no member, officer, agent or Employee directly or indirectly receiving in the form of salary of other compensation, any profits from the sale of alcoholic beverages beyond a fixed salary. For purposes of paragraph (c)(3), “a fixed salary” means the amount of compensation paid any member, officer, agent, or Employee of a private club as may be fixed for him by its members at a prior annual meeting or by the governing body out of the general revenue of the club and shall not include a commission or any profits from the sale of alcoholic beverages. Tips or gratuities, which are added to the bills under club regulations, shall not be considered as profits from the sale of alcoholic beverages.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 2.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|20|40:14">
<form.text>License Fees</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|20|40:14">

</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 3.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|20|40:14">

</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|20|40:14">
<form.text>In addition to the excise taxes levied by the State, the County does hereby levy an excise tax of $<inline.instr>__lsqb__dollar amount of tax rate__rsqb__</inline.instr> per liter on all distilled spirits sold by a wholesaler to a private club. Said tax is imposed upon wholesalers and is payable on a monthly basis as set out under Section <inline.instr>__lsqb__number of section__rsqb__</inline.instr>. Accordingly, the County also imposes an excise tax on every purchase of a mixed drink in the amount of $<inline.instr>__lsqb__dollar amount of excise tax__rsqb__</inline.instr> of the purchase price of said beverage. Said tax shall be paid by the licensee to the County and remitted monthly in the manner prescribed under Section <inline.instr>__lsqb__number of section__rsqb__</inline.instr>.</form.text>
</form.para>

<outline.name.block>
<label>&sect;</label>
<designator>40:15</designator>
<name>Open containers</name>
</outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>FMS</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>LGV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>ORD</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="I439d70002f4f11e3947f0000837bc6dd">
<form.unit>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 1.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|21|40:15">
<form.text>Consumption of alcoholic beverages and beer prohibited in certain places; open containers of alcoholic beverages and beer prohibited in certain places.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(a)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|21|40:15">
<form.text>For the purposes of this section, “open container,” means any drinking or pouring vessel, including any open or unsealed bottle, jar, can, cup, or container without a lid or with a lid but with a straw protruding therefrom or with only a partial lid, with the contents being capable of immediate consumption.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(b)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|21|40:15">
<form.text>It shall be unlawful for any person to drink or consume any alcoholic beverage or beer or have an open container of alcoholic beverage or beer in or on any of the following places:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(1)</designator>
</name.block>

</form.para>
</form.item>

<form.text>This section shall not prohibit the sale or consumption of beer or alcoholic beverages permitted pursuant to a temporary beer permit issued by the Beer Board of the City or pursuant to a special occasion license issued by the <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of state__rsqb__</inline.instr> Alcoholic Beverage Commission provided that (1) the location of such sale or consumption has been designated in the temporary beer permit issued by the Beer Board of the City or in the special occasion license issued by the Alcoholic Beverage Commission, (2) the activities at such location conform to the requirements of the <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of city__rsqb__</inline.instr> Code and the Alcoholic Beverage Commission, and (3) such sale and consumption is confined to the location designated in the temporary beer permit or special occasion license.</form.text>

<outline.name.block>
<label>&sect;</label>
<designator>40:17</designator>
<name>Liquor in parks</name>
</outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>FMS</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>LGV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>ORD</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>LUZ</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="I43ab04902f4f11e3947f0000837bc6dd">
<form.unit>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 1.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|23|40:17">
<form.text>POSSESSION OR CONSUMPTION OF ALCOHOLIC BEVERAGES IN PUBLIC PARKS. No person shall possess or consume any alcoholic beverage in or at any public park or parkland operated or owned by the city of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of city__rsqb__</inline.instr>.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 2.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|23|40:17">
<form.text>WARNING. Before issuing a citation for a violation of this ordinance, any police officer of the city may give an oral warning, or issue a written warning ticket. If the person or persons receiving the oral warning or warning ticket do not discontinue the violation a citation for ordinance violation shall be issued to the violator. If it appears necessary to make an arrest to preserve the public peace, a police officer may make an arrest for a violation of this ordinance, with or without a previous oral warning or warning ticket.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 3.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|23|40:17">
<form.text>SIGNS AND NOTICES. Signs shall be posted and notices shall be placed on bulletin boards in the parks, stating substantially as follows: “NO ALCOHOLIC BEVERAGE MAY BE BROUGHT INTO THIS PARK OR CONSUMED IN THIS PARK. CITY ORDINANCE ENFORCED.” The signs shall be placed in locations to be visible on entering the park but, when possible, to be inconspicuous to persons in the park.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 4.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.unit>
</para>
</form>
</section.body>

<section.front>
<outline.name.block>
<label>&sect;</label>
<designator>40:17.10</designator>
<name>Alcohol, public access property</name>
</outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>FMS</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>NUP</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>TEM</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>LGV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>ORD</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="I956a6220ac7d11eda381ace071fc2876">
<form.unit>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 1.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|24|40:17.10">
<form.text>Definitions - the following terms shall have the meaning indicated:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>a</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|24|40:17.10">
<form.text>Alcoholic Beverages - as defined in the “Liquor Code” of the State of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of state__rsqb__</inline.instr> (i.e. liquor, wine, malt, and brewed beverages);</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>b</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|24|40:17.10">
<form.text>Open Container - any container from which consumption of an alcoholic beverage is occurring;</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>c</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|24|40:17.10">
<form.text>Public Access Property - any public street, alley, sidewalk, park, playground, ball field, recreation areas, commons, or parking lots; or any private parking lots open to public use (regardless if the private parking lot establishment is open or closed for business);</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 2.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|24|40:17.10">
<form.text>It shall be unlawful for any person to drink an alcoholic beverage upon any public access property within the City and it shall be unlawful for any person to have in such person's possession, or in a vehicle under such person's control, any open container containing an alcoholic beverage upon any public access property in the City.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 3.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|24|40:17.10">
<form.text>Any person who shall violate the provisions of this Ordinance, shall upon conviction thereof, be sentenced to pay a fine of $<inline.instr>__lsqb__dollar amount of sum__rsqb__</inline.instr> dollars plus the costs of prosecution, or in default of payment of same, to undergo imprisonment for five (5) days for the first offense; $<inline.instr>__lsqb__dollar amount of sum__rsqb__</inline.instr> dollars plus the costs of prosecution, or in default of payment, imprisonment for ten (10) days for the second offense; and $ <inline.instr>__lsqb__dollar amount of sum__rsqb__</inline.instr> dollars plus the costs of prosecution, or in default of payment, imprisonment for ninety (90) days for the third offense and any offense thereafter.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 4.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|24|40:17.10">
<form.text>Any police officer is hereby authorized to act on behalf of the Borough.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 5.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|24|40:17.10">
<form.text>All ordinances and parts of ordinances inconsistent herewith are hereby repealed.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 6.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|24|40:17.10">
<form.text>If any provision or part of this Ordinance is for any reason found to be unconstitutional, illegal, or invalid, such decision shall not affect or impair the validity of any of the remaining provisions or parts of this Ordinance. It is hereby declared as the intent of City Council that this Ordinance would have been adopted had such unconstitutional, illegal, or invalid provision or part not included herein.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 7.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.unit>

<section.front>
<outline.name.block>
<label>&sect;</label>
<designator>40:17.50</designator>
<name>Liquor tastings</name>
</outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>FMS</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>LGV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>ORD</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="Ie92c4300473d11e984d5de4225a0cb22">
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>a</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|25|40:17.50">
<form.text>The Town hereby authorizes tastings to be conducted by retail liquor store and liquor-licensed drugstore licensees pursuant to Section <inline.instr>__lsqb__designation of section__rsqb__</inline.instr>.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>b</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|25|40:17.50">
<form.text>It is unlawful for any person or licensee within <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of town__rsqb__</inline.instr> Municipal limits to conduct tastings unless a permit has been obtained in accordance with this Ordinance. The Local Licensing Authority is authorized to issue tasting permits in accordance with the requirements of this Ordinance.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>c</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|25|40:17.50">
<form.text>A retail liquor store or liquor-licensed drugstore licensee that wishes to conduct tastings shall submit an application for a tastings permit to the Local Licensing Authority annually. The application shall be in the form required by the Town Clerk, and shall include a written control plan establishing how the applicant will conduct the tastings in compliance with the provisions of the <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of state__rsqb__</inline.instr> Liquor Code and this Ordinance, and without creating a public safety risk to the neighborhood. The Local Licensing Authority may reject the permit application if the applicant fails to establish by a preponderance of the evidence that the licensee is able to conduct tastings without violating the provisions of this section or creating a public safety risk to the neighborhood. The Local Licensing Authority and the Town Clerk may establish application procedures for tastings permits.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>d</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|25|40:17.50">
<form.text>Each application for a liquor tastings permit shall be accompanied by an initial liquor tastings application fee in the amount of $<inline.instr>__lsqb__dollar amount of sum__rsqb__</inline.instr> and a $<inline.instr>__lsqb__dollar amount of sum__rsqb__</inline.instr> annual renewal fee each year thereafter.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>e</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|25|40:17.50">
<form.text>Tastings shall be subject to the following limitations:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>I</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|25|40:17.50">
<form.text>Tastings shall be conducted only by a person who has completed a server training program that meets the standards established by the Liquor Enforcement Division of the <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of state__rsqb__</inline.instr> Department of Revenue and who is either a retail liquor store or liquor-licensed drugstore licensee, or an employee of a licensee, and only on a licensee's licensed premises.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|25|40:17.50">
<form.text>The alcohol used in tastings shall be purchased through a licensed wholesaler, licensed brew pub, or winery licensed pursuant to Section <inline.instr>__lsqb__designation of section__rsqb__</inline.instr>, at a cost that is not less than the laid-in cost of such alcohol. Such suppliers shall have licenses from the Town to the extent required by this Ordinance and Section <inline.instr>__lsqb__designation of section__rsqb__</inline.instr>.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|25|40:17.50">
<form.text>The size of an individual alcohol sample shall not exceed one ounce of malt or vinous liquor or one-half ounce of spirituous liquor.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|25|40:17.50">
<form.text>Tastings shall not exceed a total of five hours in duration per day which need not be consecutive.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>V</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|25|40:17.50">
<form.text>Tastings shall be conducted only during the operating hours in which the licensee, on whose premises the tastings occur, is permitted to sell alcohol beverages, and in no case earlier than 11 a.m. or later than 7 p.m.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|25|40:17.50">
<form.text>The licensee shall prohibit patrons from leaving the licensed premises with an unconsumed sample.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|25|40:17.50">
<form.text>The licensee shall promptly remove all open and unconsumed alcohol beverage samples from the licensed premises or shall destroy the samples immediately following the completion of the tasting.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|25|40:17.50">
<form.text>The licensee shall not serve a person who is under twenty-one (21) years of age or who is visibly intoxicated.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|25|40:17.50">
<form.text>The licensee shall not serve more than four individual samples to a patron during a tasting.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>X</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|25|40:17.50">
<form.text>Alcohol samples shall be in open containers and shall be provided to a patron free of charge.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|25|40:17.50">
<form.text>Tastings may occur on no more than four of the six days from a Monday to the following Saturday, not to exceed fifty two (52) days per year.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|25|40:17.50">
<form.text>No manufacturer of spirituous or vinous liquors shall induce a licensee through free goods or financial or in-kind assistance to favor the manufacturer's products being sampled at a tasting. The licensee shall bear the financial and all other responsibility for a tasting.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|25|40:17.50">
<form.text>The applicant for a tastings permit shall certify on the application that all persons serving alcohol at tastings have completed a server training program that meets the standards established by the Liquor Enforcement Division of the <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of state__rsqb__</inline.instr> Department of Revenue.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>f</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|25|40:17.50">
<form.text>A violation of a limitation specified in this Ordinance or of Sections <inline.instr>__lsqb__designations of sections__rsqb__</inline.instr>, by a retail liquor store or liquor-licensed drugstore licensee, whether by the licensee, the licensee's employees or agents, or otherwise shall be the responsibility of the licensee who is conducting the tasting.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>g</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|25|40:17.50">
<form.text>A licensee conducting a tasting shall be subject to the same revocation, suspension, and enforcement provisions as otherwise apply to the licensee and are imposed by the Local Licensing Authority. The Local Licensing Authority shall conduct a hearing with regard to any violations of this section in accordance with the requirements of this Ordinance and Section <inline.instr>__lsqb__designation of section__rsqb__</inline.instr>.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|25|40:17.50">
<form.text>A licensee conducting a tasting shall be subject to the same revocation, suspension, and enforcement provisions as otherwise apply to the licensee and are imposed by the Local Licensing Authority. The Local Licensing Authority shall conduct a hearing with regard to any violations of this section in accordance with the requirements of this Ordinance and Section <inline.instr>__lsqb__designation of section__rsqb__</inline.instr>.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>

<outline.name.block>
<label>&sect;</label>
<designator>40:18</designator>
<name>Public intoxication; referrals, education, arrests</name>
</outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>FMS</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>LGV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>ORD</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="I43acb2402f4f11e3947f0000837bc6dd">
<form.unit>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 1.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|26|40:18">
<form.text>DEFINITIONS. As used in this ordinance, the following terms shall have the following meanings, unless the context clearly indicates that a different meaning is intended:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|26|40:18">
<form.text>Alcoholic: A person of any age who has the disease of alcoholism, as defined in this section.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|26|40:18">
<form.text>Alcoholism: A chronic disease consisting of chemical addiction, psychological addiction or a combination of the two to the use of alcohol, of a sufficient severity to impair a person's ability to function socially, occupationally or emotionally. There may be temporary periods of apparent freedom from symptoms, followed by relapse. In some cases the condition gets worse.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|26|40:18">
<form.text>Alcoholism treatment facility: Any place or institution for the treatment of alcoholism, but not including places where persons being treated are not in residence, such as a physician's office or a place where the only alcoholic treatment services offered are counselling or advice provided by a therapist. The term “alcoholism treatment facility” includes but is not limited to detoxification centers, half way houses and residential alcoholism treatment centers.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|26|40:18">
<form.text>City: The City of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of city__rsqb__</inline.instr>.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|26|40:18">
<form.text>Health officer: The chief health officer of the city, or any person working under his or her supervision.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|26|40:18">
<form.text>Incapacitated by alcohol: The condition of being unconscious or too weak or too disoriented to be able to care for ones own needs, or to recognize obvious dangers.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|26|40:18">
<form.text>Intoxicated person: Any person who is presently impaired, physically, mentally or emotionally as a result of the presence of alcohol in the person's body.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 2.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|26|40:18">
<form.text>INTOXICATED PERSONS IN PUBLIC PLACE. No intoxicated person and no person incapacitated by alcohol shall be in any public street, alley, walk, mall, building or other place owned or controlled by the city. This section shall not prohibit any person from travelling, without operating a motor vehicle, over the most convenient route to the person's home or to a place to seek treatment for alcoholism, to seek medical treatment for any condition, to seek mental health treatment or emotional health treatment, or to seek spiritual help.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 3.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|26|40:18">
<form.text>INTOXICATED PERSONS IN OTHER PLACES, EXCEPTIONS. No intoxicated person or person incapacitated by alcohol shall be in any place in the city not owned or controlled by the city, whether such place is open to the public or not, except for the following:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(a)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|26|40:18">
<form.text>In the person's home.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(b)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|26|40:18">
<form.text>In any place where the person is present to seek treatment for alcoholism, to seek medical treatment for any condition, to seek treatment for mental health or emotional health, or to seek spiritual help.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(c)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|26|40:18">
<form.text>In any hallway or other place through which it is reasonably necessary to travel to arrive at a place described in paragraph (b), immediately above.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(d)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|26|40:18">
<form.text>In any other place where the owner, person in possession or person in charge has given permission for the intoxicated person to stay, provided that consent shall not permit an intoxicated person to stay in any place that sells or serves alcoholic liquor.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 4.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|26|40:18">
<form.text>SEVERABILITY. If any provision of this ordinance or the application thereof to any person or circumstance is held invalid, such invalidity shall not affect other provisions or applications of this ordinance which can be given effect without the invalid provisions or application, and to this end the provisions of this ordinance are severable.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 5.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|26|40:18">
<form.text>EDUCATION AND REFERRAL. In addition to the penalties and other actions possible, any police officer arresting any individual for a violation of this ordinance shall inform the person of the opportunities for education about alcohol and alcohol abuse and for treatment for alcoholism available in the city, and shall refer any person requesting a referral to a specific agency or institution for assistance. Such information and referral shall not be required if the individual is so incapacitated by alcohol that the person cannot understand the information or referral. The health officer shall provide educational materials and information about referrals to the police department.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.unit>
<note.block>
<note.group note.head="none">
<para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|26|40:18">
<para.text>
See rc.ref.id="I004G4G">McQuillin, The Law of Municipal Corporations &sect;24:183 (3d ed.).
</para.text>
</para>

<section>
<section.front>
<outline.name.block>
<label>&sect;</label>
<designator>40:19</designator>
<name>Beer and light wine privilege license</name>
</outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>FMS</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>LGV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>LIC</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="I43b16d302f4f11e3947f0000837bc6dd">
<form.unit>
<form.para>
<form.text>SECTION ONE..</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|27|40:19">
<form.text>Beer and Light Wine Privilege License.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(a)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|27|40:19">
<form.text>Privilege License required.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|27|40:19">
<form.text>Any person or entity desiring to engage in the business of selling beer and light wine at retail shall pay the City a privilege license tax in the amount as that imposed by <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of state__rsqb__</inline.instr> Code Ann. &sect;<inline.instr>__lsqb__number of section__rsqb__</inline.instr> for the purpose of engaging in such business and shall file with the City Clerk an application showing that such person possesses all the requirements provided for in this article. Such applicants shall exhibit a permit as required by <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of state__rsqb__</inline.instr> Code Ann. &sect;<inline.instr>__lsqb__number of section__rsqb__</inline.instr>. All such City privilege licenses shall be applied for and renewed annually. It shall be unlawful for any person to engage in the business of the retail sale of beer and light wine without having first applied for and obtained from the City Clerk a privilege license to engage in such business.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(b)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|27|40:19">
<form.text>Application for Privilege License.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|27|40:19">
<form.text>Any person or entity desiring a license to sell beer at retail or desiring to renew such a license to sell beer and/or light wine shall file an application with the City Clerk in the form of a sworn statement giving the name of the business, its location, the mailing address, and if a partnership or firm, the name and address of each partner or member and, if a corporation, the names of two principal officers and the nature of business in which engaged. In case any business is conducted by the same person or entity at two or more separate places, a separate license for each place of business shall be required. The applicant shall further show in the sworn application for a license that the applicant and/or its principals (as identified below) possess the following qualifications:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(1)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|27|40:19">
<form.text>Over 21 years of age and a person of good moral character;</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(2)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|27|40:19">
<form.text>No convictions in this or any other state of a felony or of pandering, or of keeping or maintaining a house of prostitution; and</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(3)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|27|40:19">
<form.text>No revocation of any license or permit to sell alcoholic liquors, beer, or light wine, pursuant to the laws of this City, this state or any other state, or of the United States, within two (2) years preceding the date of application.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|27|40:19">
<form.text>If applicant is a partnership, firm, or limited liability company, all members of the partnership, firm, or limited liability company must be named and must meet the above-listed qualifications.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|27|40:19">
<form.text>If the applicant is a corporation, all officers and directors thereof, and any stockholder owning more than five percent of the stock of such corporation, and the person who shall conduct and maintain the licensed premises for the corporation shall possess all the qualifications required herein for an individual licensee.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|27|40:19">
<form.text>Discovery of any false statement made on the application or during the application process shall be grounds for immediate revocation of the privilege license. The licensee shall retain a list of all person employed by the licensee who sell and/or serve beer and/or light wine, including with the list the name, address and age of each such employee, and such list shall be made available upon request of municipal authorities.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(c)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|27|40:19">
<form.text>Compliance Representative.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|27|40:19">
<form.text>As a condition precedent to the issuance of a privilege license, the licensee must agree to appoint a compliance representative, who shall apply for a compliance representative permit with the City Clerk. Each applicant must meet the following requirements in order to receive a permit:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(1)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|27|40:19">
<form.text>Must be 21 years of age or older; and</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(2)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|27|40:19">
<form.text>Must agree to complete within two (2) months of the date of application a required training course, for a fee to be set by the <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of city__rsqb__</inline.instr> Police Department, to be conducted by the <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of city__rsqb__</inline.instr> Police Department pursuant to the training guidelines of the <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of state__rsqb__</inline.instr> Alcoholic Beverage Commission.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|27|40:19">
<form.text>Each compliance representative permit shall be issued for a period of one (1) year, which can be renewed for the following two (2) years with no additional requirements, if neither the privilege licensee nor the compliance representative is convicted of a violation of this section or Section <inline.instr>__lsqb__number of section__rsqb__</inline.instr> during the prior year.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|27|40:19">
<form.text>If the permitted compliance representative is either no longer employed by the privilege licensee or has his or her compliance representative permit revoked, then the licensee must appoint a new representative who must meet the requirements of this section.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(d)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|27|40:19">
<form.text>Optional Training of Employees.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|27|40:19">
<form.text>Although only the compliance representative of each licensee shall be required to attend the training course conducted by the <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of city__rsqb__</inline.instr> Police Department, said training course shall be made available to all who wish to attend, subject to payment of the registration fee for same, and all privilege licensees are encouraged to offer such training to their employees.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(e)</designator>
</name.block>

</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|27|40:19">
<form.text>Each wholesaler or distributor of light wine or beer and each person or entity engaged in the business of brewing, manufacturing, or producing beer or light wine shall comply with the requirements of Section <inline.instr>__lsqb__number of section__rsqb__</inline.instr> in order to obtain a privilege license to engage in such business within the City of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of city__rsqb__</inline.instr>.</form.text>
</form.para>

<form.para>
<form.text>SECTION TWO..</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|27|40:19">
<form.text>Privilege license holder regulated.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|27|40:19">
<form.text>It shall be unlawful in the City of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of city__rsqb__</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of state__rsqb__</inline.instr>, for any owner, proprietor, manager or employee of any establishment which has a privilege license authorizing the sale of light wine or beer at retail to violate any of the following provisions (a) through (l) of this section:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(a)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|27|40:19">
<form.text>Hours regulated.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|27|40:19">
<form.text>Sell, give or dispense or permit to be consumed in or upon a licensed premises, any light wine or beer during the days, Monday through Saturday between the hours of midnight and 7:00 A.M. the following morning, and on Sundays or such other times as the mayor and board may designate with the approval of the <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of state__rsqb__</inline.instr> State Tax Commission.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(b)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|27|40:19">
<form.text>Sale of refrigerated wine or beer.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|27|40:19">
<form.text>Sell, give or dispense or permit to be consumed any light wine or beer which has been refrigerated, except by those holding an on-premises retailer's permit as required by Section <inline.instr>__lsqb__number of section__rsqb__</inline.instr> herein.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(c)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|27|40:19">
<form.text>Distance requirements.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|27|40:19">
<form.text>Sell or store light wine or beer within four hundred (400) feet of any church, school, kindergarten or funeral home except within an area zoned commercial, business or industrial or an area bearing like designations, such minimal distance shall not be less than one hundred (100) feet, except where separated by an intervening street. Such distances shall be measured along a straight line between the nearest points of the building in which such light wine and beer is sold or stored and the building housing such church, school, kindergarten or funeral home.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(d)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|27|40:19">
<form.text>Advertising signs.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|27|40:19">
<form.text>Display any outside sign or signs advertising the sale of light wine or beer within the City.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(e)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|27|40:19">
<form.text>Furnishing to minors.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|27|40:19">
<form.text>Sell, give or furnish in any manner any light wine or beer at any time or place to any person under twenty-one (21) years of age, or to knowingly sell, furnish or give the same to any person for delivery to such minors, unless authorized pursuant to <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of state__rsqb__</inline.instr> Code Ann. &sect;<inline.instr>__lsqb__number of section__rsqb__</inline.instr>.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(f)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|27|40:19">
<form.text>Selling, giving to mentally incompetent or intoxicated persons.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|27|40:19">
<form.text>Sell, give, or furnish in any manner any light wine or beer at any time or place to any person who is known to be insane or mentally incapacitated, or to any person who is visibly intoxicated, or to knowingly sell, furnish or give the same to any person for delivery to such persons.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(g)</designator>
</name.block>

<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|27|40:19">
<form.text>Employ as a bartender/server any person who has been convicted of two (2) or more violations of Sections <inline.instr>__lsqb__numbers of sections__rsqb__</inline.instr> of this Chapter within the last six (6) months. It shall be the responsibility of the licensee/employer to conduct routine background checks of its bartenders/servers to ensure compliance with this section.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(h)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|27|40:19">

<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|27|40:19">
<form.text>Permit the consumption of light wine or beer on the premises of any retail establishment unless such establishment holds an on-premises retailer's permit issued by the Alcoholic Beverage Control Division of the State Tax Commission of the State of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of state__rsqb__</inline.instr>.</form.text>

<form.text>SECTION THREE..</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|27|40:19">

<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|27|40:19">
<form.text>It shall be unlawful within the corporate limits of the city for any person to consume or have in his/her possession any open container containing alcoholic beverages, light wine or beer on any street, sidewalk, alley or other public way.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>SECTION FOUR..</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|27|40:19">
<form.text>Possession by minors; penalty.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|27|40:19">
<form.text>It shall be unlawful for any person under the age of twenty-one (21) years to purchase consume or have in his possession any light wine or beer, unless authorized by <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of state__rsqb__</inline.instr> Code Ann. &sect;<inline.instr>__lsqb__number of section__rsqb__</inline.instr>. The penalty for violating this provision shall be a fine of not less than $<inline.instr>__lsqb__dollar amount of fine__rsqb__</inline.instr> nor more than $<inline.instr>__lsqb__dollar amount of fine__rsqb__</inline.instr> and a sentence to not more than thirty (30) days' community service.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|27|40:19">
<form.text>The judge may in his/her discretion accept, in lieu of community service, a certificate indicating the individual has successfully completed an alcohol and/or drug education program or treatment program, at the expense of the individual.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>SECTION FIVE..</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|27|40:19">
<form.text>Minors giving false identification; penalty.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|27|40:19">
<form.text>It shall be unlawful for any person under the age of twenty-one (21) years to make a false statement as to his or her age for the purpose of obtaining light wine or beer. The penalty for violating this provision shall be a fine of not less than $<inline.instr>__lsqb__dollar amount of fine__rsqb__</inline.instr> nor more than $<inline.instr>__lsqb__dollar amount of fine__rsqb__</inline.instr> and a sentence to not more than thirty (30) days community service.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|27|40:19">
<form.text>The judge may in <inline.instr>__lsqb__his/her__rsqb__</inline.instr> discretion accept, in lieu of community service, a certificate indicating the individual has successfully completed an alcohol and/or drug education program or treatment program, at the expense of the individual.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>SECTION SIX..</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|27|40:19">
<form.text>Permit and/or license required.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(A)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|27|40:19">
<form.text>Business Premises: It is unlawful for any person to sell, give or dispense or permit to be consumed or possessed in or upon any premises operated as a business for profit, any alcoholic beverage, light wine, or beer without <trace>first</trace> having secured a permit and/or license authorizing the sale of such alcoholic beverage, light wine, or beer at retail. The premises herein above described and secured by a permit and/or license shall be defined as the premises approved by the Alcoholic Beverage Control Division of the State Tax Commission. A copy of said approved premises (floor plan) shall be filed with the chief of police. Provided, further, it shall be unlawful for any person to consume alcoholic beverages, light wine or beer outside of the approved premises of the business holding a permit and/or license. Provided any premises operated as a business for profit shall not include a clubhouse, game room or similar facility made available without cost to renter and/or owners of individual units within the premises wherein alcoholic beverages, light wine or beer may be furnished free of charge by said owners or renters to their guests. Provided, further, that the owner or manager of any business other than restaurant may promote and advertise on the premises the services/products of said business by furnishing free of charge to its customers of legal age any alcoholic beverage, light wine or beer. Provided, however, that the management of any restaurant that does not posses such a permit and/or license may allow its customer to bring on the premises and consume with meals only in the restaurant area only light wine or beer or alcoholic beverages during the hours applicable to licensed on-premises retailers. Provided, further, that the management, including the owner of any such restaurant, shall abide by and comply with all applicable ordinances pertaining to on premises retailers.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(B)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|27|40:19">
<form.text>The owner of any restaurant that does not possess on-premises retailer's permit before complying with subsection (a) above shall make application to be provided by the City Clerk and pay an annual fee of $<inline.instr>__lsqb__dollar amount of fee__rsqb__</inline.instr> for a “restaurant consumption permit.” Said permit shall be approved by the board of aldermen before said permit is valid. Any violation of any of the ordinances applicable to such restaurants shall result in a revocation of the permit by said board.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(C)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|27|40:19">
<form.text>The number of occupants of any building or portion thereof shall not be permitted to exceed the allowed or posted capacity. In addition, no person shall permit overcrowding or admittance of any person beyond the approved capacity of any place of public assembly. Any police official, upon finding any overcrowding conditions or obstructions in aisles, passageways, or other means of egress, or upon finding any conditions which constitute a serious menace to life, shall cause the performance, presentation, spectacle or entertainment to be stopped until such conditions or obstructions are corrected.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>

<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|27|40:19">

<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|27|40:19">

</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(ii)</designator>
</name.block>

</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(iii)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|27|40:19">

The licensee may reapply for such license, pursuant to the requirements of SECTION ONE(b)(3), after two (2) years from the date of the third violation that led to such revocation.</form.text>
</form.para>

</form.unit>
</form.item>

<section.body>
<form uuid="I43d151402f4f11e3947f0000837bc6dd">
<form.unit>
<form.para>
<form.text>Regulations on Premises</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(a)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|28|40:20">
<form.text>A licensee authorized to sell distilled spirits by the package shall affix to each bottle or container or distilled spirits, or to the edge of the shelf whereon such bottles or containers are located directly beneath such bottles or containers, a tag showing the prices of individual bottles or containers. A licensee authorized to sell alcoholic beverages for consumption on the premises shall display inside the place of business their current prices.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(b)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|28|40:20">
<form.text>The exterior of each building where alcoholic beverages are sold for consumption on the premises shall contain sufficient lighting so that all sides of the building and entrances thereto are clearly visible at all times when the premises are opened for business.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(c)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|28|40:20">
<form.text>The licensee shall post in a prominent location on the licensed premises, in a manner where by it may be easily viewed by patrons, an approved sign setting forth or summarizing the laws of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of county__rsqb__</inline.instr> and the State of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of state__rsqb__</inline.instr> in regard to the sale of alcoholic beverages to underage, intoxicated, or pregnant persons. Each sign shall be of a size and configuration approved by the Department of Revenue of the State of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of state__rsqb__</inline.instr> and said sign shall be made available to said licensee by the County Manager at a price to be established by the County.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.para>
<form.text>Types of Outlets Where Package Sales Are Permitted</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(a)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|28|40:20">
<form.text>Distilled spirits by the package may be sold at retail, only in:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(1)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|28|40:20">
<form.text>Outlets duly licensed to sell distilled spirits by the package; and</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(2)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|28|40:20">
<form.text>Outlets which are devoted exclusively to the retail sale of distilled spirits, beer and wine by the package with ingress and egress provided directly to and only to the exterior of the building in which the facility is located and not to any other enclosed part of the building or adjoining building, except in hotels, motels, and high-rise office buildings where every public entrance to this outlet shall be from a lobby, hallway, or other interior portion of the primary use structure.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(b)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|28|40:20">
<form.text>Nothing in this section shall prohibit the retail sale within these outlets of liquid commodities and mixes normally used in the preparation and serving of distilled spirits. It is the intention of this section to allow the retail sale of distilled spirits by the package only in outlets devoted exclusively to the sale of distilled spirits, beer, and wine, and to prohibit such sales in outlets that sell groceries, food, gasoline, and other such commodities.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>

<section.body>
<form uuid="I43db3c502f4f11e3947f0000837bc6dd">
<form.unit>
<form.para>
<form.text>Underage and intoxicated persons, presence on licensed premises; possession; misuse of identification; penalties.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>1</designator>
<name>1.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>Sale of Alcohol Beverages to Underage Persons.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(a)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>Restrictions.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>No person may procure for, sell, dispense or give away any alcohol beverages to any underage person not accompanied by his or her parent, guardian or spouse who has attained the legal drinking age.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>No licensee or permittee may sell, vend, deal or traffic in alcohol beverages to or with any underage person not accompanied by his or her parent, guardian or spouse who has attained the legal drinking age.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>No adult may knowingly permit or fail to take action to prevent the illegal consumption of alcohol beverages by an underage person on premises owned by the adult or under the adult's control. This paragraph does not apply to alcohol beverages used exclusively as part of a religious service.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>No adult may intentionally encourage or contribute to a violation of Sec. 1.1(a) or (b).</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(b)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>Penalties and License Suspension for Sale to Underage Person.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>A person who commits a violation is subject to a forfeiture of:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>a</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>Not more than $<inline.instr>__lsqb__dollar amount of penalty__rsqb__</inline.instr> if the person has not committed a previous violation within 30 months of the violation.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>b</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>Not more than $<inline.instr>__lsqb__dollar amount of penalty__rsqb__</inline.instr> if the person has committed a previous violation within 30 months of the violation.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>c</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>Not more than $<inline.instr>__lsqb__dollar amount of penalty__rsqb__</inline.instr> if the person has committed two previous violations within 30 months of the violation.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>d</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>Not more than $<inline.instr>__lsqb__dollar amount of penalty__rsqb__</inline.instr> if the person has committed three or more previous violations within 30 months of the violation.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>A court shall suspend any license or permit issued under this chapter to a person for:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>a</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>Not more than three days, if the court finds that the person committed a violation within 12 months after committing one previous violation; or</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>b</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>Not less than three days nor more than 10 days, if the court finds that the person committed a violation within 12 months after committing two other violations; or</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>c</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>Not less than 15 days nor more than 30 days, if the court finds that the person committed the violation within 12 months after committing three other violations.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>The court shall promptly mail notice of a suspension under this paragraph to the department and to the clerk of each municipality which has issued a license or permit to the person.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>For purposes of determining whether or not a previous violation has occurred, if more than one violation occurs at the same time all those violations shall be counted as one violation.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>1</designator>
<name>2.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>Intoxicated Persons.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(a)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>Restrictions.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>No person may procure for, sell, dispense, or give away alcohol beverages to a person who is intoxicated.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>No licensee or permittee may sell, vend, deal or traffic in alcohol beverages to or with a person who is intoxicated.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>No licensee or permittee may permit an intoxicated person to be on a licensed premises.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(b)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>Penalties. Any person who violates subdivision (a) shall be fined not less than $<inline.instr>__lsqb__dollar amount of minimum fine__rsqb__</inline.instr> nor more than $<inline.instr>__lsqb__dollar amount of maximum fine__rsqb__</inline.instr>.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>1</designator>
<name>3.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>Presence in Places of Sale; Penalty.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(a)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>Restrictions. An underage person, not accompanied by his or her parent, guardian or spouse who has attained the legal drinking age, may not enter or be on any premises for which a license or permit for the retail sale of alcohol beverages has been issued, for any purpose except the transaction of business pertaining to the licensed premises with or for the licensee or his or her employee. The business may not be amusement or the purchase, receiving or consumption of edibles or beverages or similar activities which normally constitute activities of a customer of the premises. This paragraph does not apply to:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>An underage person who is a resident, employee, lodger or boarder on the premises controlled by the proprietor, licensee or permittee of which the licensed premises consists or is a part.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>An underage person who enters or is on a Class “A” premises for the purpose of purchasing items other than alcohol beverages. An underage person so entering the premises may not remain on the premises after the purchase.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>Hotels, drug stores, grocery stores, bowling centers, indoor golf simulator facilities, service stations, vessels, cars operated by any railroad, regularly established athletic fields, outdoor volleyball courts that are contiguous to a licensed premises, stadiums, public facilities as defined in <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of state__rsqb__</inline.instr> Revised Statutes Sec. <inline.instr>__lsqb__number of section__rsqb__</inline.instr> which are owned by a county or municipality, or centers for the visual or performing arts.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>Premises in the state fair park, concessions authorized on state-owned premises in the state parks and state forests as defined or designated in Chapters <inline.instr>__lsqb__number of chapter 1__rsqb__</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>__lsqb__number of chapter 2__rsqb__</inline.instr>, and <inline.instr>__lsqb__number of chapter 3__rsqb__</inline.instr> Revised Statutes, and parks owned or operated by agricultural societies.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>Ski chalets, golf courses and golf clubhouses, racetracks licensed under Ch. <inline.instr>__lsqb__number of chapter__rsqb__</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of state__rsqb__</inline.instr> Revised Statutes, curling clubs, private soccer clubs, and private tennis clubs.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>Premises operated under both a Class “B” license or permit and a restaurant permit where the principal business conducted is that of a restaurant. If the premises are operated under both a Class “B” license or permit and a restaurant permit, the principal business conducted is presumed to be the sale of alcohol beverages, but the presumption may be rebutted by competent evidence.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>An underage person who enters or remains on a Class “B” premises for the purpose of transacting business at an auction or market if the person does not enter or remain in a room where alcohol beverages are sold, furnished, or possessed.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>A person who is at least eighteen (18) years of age and who is working under a contract with the licensee, permittee or corporate agent to provide entertainment for customers on the premises.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>An underage person who enters or remains on Class “B” licensed premises on a date specified by the licensee or permittee during times when no alcohol beverages are consumed, sold or given away. During those times, the licensee, the agent named in the license if the licensee is a corporation or a limited liability company, or a person who has an operator's license shall be on the premises unless all alcohol beverages are stored in a locked portion of the premises. The licensee shall notify the local law enforcement agency, in advance, of the times underage persons will be allowed on the premises under this subdivision. Such notification shall be in writing and must be received in the office of the Chief of Police not less than 48 hours prior to the start of the scheduled nonalcohol event.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>An underage person who enters or remains in a dance hall attached to Class “B” licensed premises if the dance hall is separate from any room where alcohol beverages are sold, if there is a separate entrance to the dance hall, and if no alcohol beverages are furnished or consumed by any person in the dance hall where the underage person is present. When such a dance hall is designated or used so as to lawfully allow the presence of underaged persons, notification in writing must be received by the Chief of Police at least 48 hours prior to the use.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(b)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>Penalties.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>A licensee or permittee who directly or indirectly permits an underage person to enter or be on a licensed premises in violation of subdivision (a) is subject to a forfeiture of not more than $<inline.instr>__lsqb__dollar amount of penalty__rsqb__</inline.instr>.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>Any person who engages in activity which requires a license or permit pursuant to Chap. <inline.instr>__lsqb__number of chapter__rsqb__</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of state__rsqb__</inline.instr> Revised Statutes, and who permits directly or indirectly an underaged person onto the premises where said activity is occurring is subject to a forfeiture of not more than $<inline.instr>__lsqb__dollar amount of penalty__rsqb__</inline.instr>. This prohibition is subject to the exceptions contained in Sec. 1.3(a) above.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>1</designator>
<name>4.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>Underage Persons; Prohibitions; Penalties.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(a)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>Any underage person who does any of the following is guilty of a violation:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>Procures or attempts to procure alcohol beverages from a licensee or permittee.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>Unless accompanied by a parent, guardian, or spouse who has attained the legal drinking age, possesses or consumes alcohol beverages on licensed premises.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>Enters, knowingly attempts to enter, or is on licensed premises in violation of Section 1.3(a).</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>Falsely represents his or her age for the purpose of receiving alcohol beverages from a licensee or permittee.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>Intentionally carries an official identification card not legally issued to him or her, an official identification card obtained under false pretenses or an official identification card which has been altered or duplicated to convey false information.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>Makes, alters or duplicates an official identification card purporting to show that she or he has attained the legal drinking age.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>Presents false information to an issuing officer in applying for an official identification.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>Intentionally carries an identification card or other documentation showing that the person has attained the legal drinking age, with knowledge that the documentation is false.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>Provides to another underage person an official identification card or other documentation purporting to show that the other underage person has attained the legal drinking age, with knowledge that the documentation is false.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(b)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>Any underage person not accompanied by his or her parent, guardian or spouse who has attained the legal drinking age who knowingly possesses or consumes alcohol beverages is guilty of a violation.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>Any person violating Subdivision (b) is subject to the following penalties:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>a</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>For a first violation, a forfeiture of not less than $<inline.instr>__lsqb__dollar amount of minimum penalty__rsqb__</inline.instr> nor more than $<inline.instr>__lsqb__dollar amount of maximum penalty__rsqb__</inline.instr>, suspension of the person's operating privilege as provided under Sec. <inline.instr>__lsqb__number of section__rsqb__</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of state__rsqb__</inline.instr> Revised Statutes, participation in a supervised work program under Sec. <inline.instr>__lsqb__number of section__rsqb__</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of state__rsqb__</inline.instr> Revised Statutes, or any combination of these penalties.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>b</designator>

<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>Defenses. In determining whether or not a licensee or permittee has violated Subs 1.1(a) and 1.3(a), all relevant circumstances surrounding the presence of the underage person or the procuring, selling, dispensing or giving away of alcohol beverages may be considered, including any circumstance under subdiv. (a) to (d). In addition, proof of all of the following facts by a seller of alcohol beverages to an underage person is a defense to any prosecution for a violation of this section.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(a)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>That the purchaser falsely represented that she or he had attained the legal drinking age.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(b)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>That the appearance of the purchaser was such that an ordinary and prudent person would believe that the purchaser had attained the legal drinking age.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(c)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>That the sale was made in good faith and in reliance on the representation and appearance of the purchaser in the belief that the purchaser had attained the legal drinking age.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(d)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>That the underage person supported the representation under subdiv. (a) with documentation that she or he had attained the legal drinking age.</form.text>
</form.para>

<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(a)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>Definition. In this section, “official identification card” means a valid operator's license issued under Ch. <inline.instr>__lsqb__number of chapter__rsqb__</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of state__rsqb__</inline.instr> Revised Statutes, that contains the photograph of the holder, an identification card issued under Sec. <inline.instr>__lsqb__number of section__rsqb__</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of state__rsqb__</inline.instr> Revised Statutes, or an identification card issued under Sec. <inline.instr>__lsqb__number of section__rsqb__</inline.instr> Revised Statutes.</form.text>

<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(b)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>Use. No card other than the identification card authorized under this section may be recognized as an official identification card in this state. In place of an official identification card, documentary proof under Sec. <inline.instr>__lsqb__number of section__rsqb__</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of state__rsqb__</inline.instr> Revised Statutes, may be substituted.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(c)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|31|40:23">
<form.text>No person may make, alter or duplicate an official identification card, provide an official identification card to an underage person or knowingly provide other documentation to an underage person purporting to show that the underage person has attained the legal drinking age. No person may possess an official identification card or other documentation used for proof of age with the intent of providing it to an underage person. Except as provided in subdivisions (d) and (e), any person who violates this subsection may forfeit not less than $<inline.instr>__lsqb__dollar amount of minimum penalty__rsqb__</inline.instr> nor more than $<inline.instr>__lsqb__dollar amount of maximum penalty__rsqb__</inline.instr>.</form.text>
</form.para>
