<section>
<section.front>
<outline.name.block>
<label>&sect;</label>
<designator>40:35</designator>
<name>Smoking prohibitions<sep/> Generally</name>
</outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>FMS</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>LGV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>ORD</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="I43f74fd02f4f11e3947f0000837bc6dd">
<form.unit>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 1.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|44|40:35">
<form.text>DETERMINATIONS. The city council recognizes the right and need of those who wish to breathe smoke-free air and finds and declares that the smoke of tobacco, tobacco related products and tobacco substitutes, fillers and other plants or weeds is a hazard to the health of the general public. Accordingly, it has been determined that the health, safety, and welfare of the residents of the city would be furthered by the regulation of smoking in enclosed places and in places of employment.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 2.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|44|40:35">
<form.text>DEFINITIONS. As used in this ordinance, the following terms shall have the following meanings, unless the context clearly indicates that a different meaning is intended:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|44|40:35">
<form.text>City: The City of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of city__rsqb__</inline.instr></form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|44|40:35">
<form.text>Smoke or smoking: The act of burning any tobacco product, weed, filler or plant of any kind in a cigarette, cigar, pipe, hookah or water pipe, or in any other device.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|44|40:35">
<form.text>Smoke-polluted air: Air in which the odor caused by smoking is detectable by any person present, or in which there is any visible smoke caused by smoking, or in which a person experiences any of the following as a result of substances in the air caused by smoking: physical discomfort, difficulty in breathing, pain in the eyes or nose, watering eyes, coughing or sneezing. Smoke-polluted air also includes air having sufficient concentrations of mood-altering substances to alter the mood or perceptions of a person breathing the air.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 3.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|44|40:35">
<form.text>PROHIBITION OF SMOKING IN CITY OWNED FACILITIES. Enclosed facilities of the city shall be subject to the pertinent provisions of this ordinance with the exception, however, that all smoking shall be prohibited in the city hall. Persons at the city hall may smoke in the patio area, provided that no city employee shall go to the patio area to smoke except during authorized breaks and lunch periods.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 4.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|44|40:35">
<form.text>PLACES WHERE SMOKING IS PROHIBITED. No person shall smoke in any of the following places within the city:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(a)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|44|40:35">
<form.text>Elevators;</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(b)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|44|40:35">
<form.text>Buses, taxicabs and other means of public transit while within the boundaries of the city;</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(c)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|44|40:35">
<form.text>Public restrooms;</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(d)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|44|40:35">
<form.text>All enclosed areas open to and customarily used by the public in retail stores, eating establishments and in all other businesses patronized by the public including, but not limited to, pharmacies, banks, savings and loan offices, attorneys' offices, insurance offices, hotels and motels;</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(e)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|44|40:35">
<form.text>Waiting rooms, hallways, wards and semiprivate rooms of health facilities, including, but not limited to, hospitals, clinics, emergency rooms, physical therapy facilities, doctors' offices and dentists' offices;</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(f)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|44|40:35">
<form.text>Museums, galleries and similar places;</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(g)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|44|40:35">
<form.text>Theaters, auditoriums, halls and similar places which are used for motion pictures, stage dramas, musical performances, ballets or other exhibitions; and</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(h)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|44|40:35">
<form.text>Within every chamber, place of meeting, or public assembly in the city.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 5.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|44|40:35">
<form.text>WORK AREA. Employers must provide a smoke-free work area to any employee who requests one in writing.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 6.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|44|40:35">
<form.text>OWNER'S OR MANAGER'S PROVISIONS. The following regulations shall apply:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(a)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|44|40:35">
<form.text>The owner or manager of any establishment regulated by this ordinance may designate the entire establishment as a no smoking area;</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(b)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|44|40:35">
<form.text>Notwithstanding any other provision of this ordinance, the owner or manager of any establishment regulated by this ordinance may designate smoking areas and no smoking areas, provided that:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(1)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|44|40:35">
<form.text>The no smoking areas shall be kept clear of smoke;</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(2)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|44|40:35">
<form.text>The smoking areas shall not include any part of the establishment to which nonsmokers may need access;</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(3)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|44|40:35">
<form.text>The no smoking areas are of sufficient size so as to accommodate nonsmokers at least to the same extent to which smokers are accommodated; and</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(4)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|44|40:35">
<form.text>No person shall be forced to breathe smoke-polluted air as a condition of employment or as a prerequisite to obtaining any service or thing.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 7.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|44|40:35">
<form.text>SMOKING PERMITTED AREAS. Smoking is permitted in certain areas subject to the following regulations:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(a)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|44|40:35">
<form.text>Smoking is permitted in hotel and motel rooms rented to guests unless the person presently renting the room orally or in writing prohibits smoking. If more than one person rents a room, any one of them may prohibit smoking, in which case no person shall smoke in the room;</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(b)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|44|40:35">
<form.text>Semiprivate rooms and wards in hospitals may be designated as smoking areas if all occupants agree; and</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(c)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|44|40:35">
<form.text>Requirements for no smoking areas shall not apply to rooms when they are in use for private functions.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 8.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|44|40:35">
<form.text>POSTING OF SIGNS. “Smoking permitted” or “no smoking” signs with letters of not less than one inch in height shall be conspicuously posted in every room, building, or other place where smoking is controlled by this ordinance, by the owner, operator, manager, or other person having control of such room, building or other place. Such signs may have additional or different wording to explain the applying rule in a particular room or area.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 9.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|44|40:35">
<form.text>ENFORCEMENT PROCEDURES, INFRACTIONS AND PENALTIES.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(a)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|44|40:35">
<form.text>It is the right of any owner, manager, operator and their employees to inform persons violating this ordinance of the appropriate provisions thereof.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(b)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|44|40:35">
<form.text>Any citizen who wishes to register a complaint hereunder may initiate enforcement at the city hall.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(c)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|44|40:35">
<form.text>Enforcement shall be implemented by the city manager or through a city staff person designated by him. Such person shall have authority to issue persuasive letters or citations based upon reasonable cause in a manner most suitable to the particular incident.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 10.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|44|40:35">
<form.text>NO PREEMPTION. This ordinance shall not be interpreted to permit smoking where it is otherwise restricted by law.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 11.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|44|40:35">
<form.text>SEVERABILITY. If any provision of this ordinance or the application thereof to any person or circumstance is held invalid, such invalidity shall not affect other provisions or applications of this ordinance which can be given effect without the invalid provisions or application, and to this end the provisions of this ordinance are severable.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 12.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|44|40:35">
<form.text>NUISANCE, INJUNCTION. Any violation of this ordinance is hereby declared to be a nuisance. In addition to any other relief provided by this ordinance, the city attorney may apply to a court of competent jurisdiction for an injunction to prohibit the continuation of any violation of this ordinance. Such application for relief may include seeking a temporary restraining order, temporary injunction and permanent injunction.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.unit>
<note.block>
<note.group note.head="none">
<para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|44|40:35">

See rc.ref.id="I005UOP">McQuillin, The Law of Municipal Corporations &sect;24:239 (3d ed.).
</para.text>
</para>
</note.group>
</note.block>

<section>
<section.front>
<outline.name.block>
<label>&sect;</label>
<designator>40:36</designator>
<name>Sale and use of nontobacco nicotine delivery products</name>
</outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>FMS</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>LGV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>ORD</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="I43faab302f4f11e3947f0000837bc6dd">
<form.unit>
<form.para>
<form.text>A Statement of Purpose:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|45|40:36">
<form.text>Whereas there exists conclusive evidence that; the U.S. Department of Health and Human Services has concluded that nicotine is as addictive as cocaine or heroin; the appeal created by Nicotine Delivery Products or e-cigarettes, which contain addictive nicotine, can lead minors into a nicotine addiction that may result in their daily use of tobacco; the U.S. Food and Drug Administration has conducted laboratory tests finding e-cigarettes contain toxic chemicals and carcinogens; e-cigarettes seriously compromise current laws governing indoor smoking bans including, but not limited to, the Smoke-Free Workplace Law and the Education Reform Act; and the town of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of town__rsqb__</inline.instr> aims to protect its youth against the use of Nicotine Delivery Products and its residents against the involuntary exposure of vapors from Nicotine Delivery Products such as e-cigarettes; now, therefore it is the intention of the <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of town__rsqb__</inline.instr> Board of Health to curtail the access to and use of Nicotine Delivery Products.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>B Authority:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|45|40:36">
<form.text>This regulation is promulgated pursuant to the authority granted to the <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of town__rsqb__</inline.instr> Board of Health by <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of state__rsqb__</inline.instr> General Laws <inline.instr>__lsqb__citation of statute__rsqb__</inline.instr>, that “Boards of Health may make reasonable health regulations.”</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>C Definitions:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|45|40:36">
<form.text>For the purpose of this regulation, the following words shall have the following meanings:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|45|40:36">
<form.text>Business Agent: An individual who has been designated by the owner or operator of any establishment to be the manager or otherwise in charge of said establishment.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|45|40:36">
<form.text>E-Cigarette: Any electronic Nicotine Delivery Product composed of a mouthpiece, heating element, battery and/or electronic circuits that provides a vapor of liquid nicotine to the user, or relies on vaporization of any liquid or solid nicotine. This term shall include such devices whether they are manufactured as e-cigarettes, e-cigars, e-pipes or under any other product name.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|45|40:36">
<form.text>Employee: Any individual who performs services for an employer.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|45|40:36">
<form.text>Employer: Any individual, partnership, association, corporation, trust or other organized group of individuals, including the town of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of town__rsqb__</inline.instr> or any agency thereof, which uses the services of one (1) or more employees.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|45|40:36">
<form.text>Liquid Nicotine (also known as “nicotine solution”): Any product composed either in whole, or in part, of nicotine and manufactured for use with Nicotine Delivery Products, including, but not limited to, e-cigarettes.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|45|40:36">
<form.text>Minor: Any individual who is under the age of eighteen (18).</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|45|40:36">
<form.text>Nicotine Delivery Product: Any article or product made wholly or in part of a tobacco substitute or otherwise containing nicotine that is expected or intended for human consumption, but not including a tobacco substitute prescribed by a licensed physician or a product that has been approved by the United States Food and Drug Administration for sale as a tobacco use cessation or harm reduction product or for other medical purposes and which is being marketed and sold solely for that approved purpose.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|45|40:36">
<form.text>Person: An individual, employer, employee, retail store manager or owner, or the owner or operator of any establishment engaged in the sale or distribution of Nicotine Delivery Products directly to consumers.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|45|40:36">
<form.text>Self Service Display: Any display from which customers may select a Nicotine Delivery Product without assistance from an employee or store personnel, excluding vending machines.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|45|40:36">
<form.text>Vending Machine: Any automated or mechanical self-service device, which upon insertion of money, tokens or any other form of payment, dispenses Nicotine Delivery Products.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>D Nicotine Delivery Product Sales Permit:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|45|40:36">
<form.text>A Nicotine Delivery Product Sales Permit is required for any retailer who sells Nicotine Delivery Products in <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of town__rsqb__</inline.instr>.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|45|40:36">
<form.text>No person shall sell or otherwise distribute Nicotine Delivery Products at retail within <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of town__rsqb__</inline.instr> without first obtaining a Nicotine Delivery Product Sales Permit issued annually by the <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of town__rsqb__</inline.instr> Board of Health. Only owners of establishments with a permanent, nonmobile location in <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of town__rsqb__</inline.instr> are eligible to apply for a permit and sell Nicotine Delivery Products at the specified location in <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of town__rsqb__</inline.instr>.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|45|40:36">
<form.text>As part of the Nicotine Delivery Product Sales Permit application process, the applicant will be provided with the <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of town__rsqb__</inline.instr> Board of Health regulation. Each applicant is required to sign a statement declaring that the applicant has read said regulation and that the applicant is responsible for instructing any and all employees who will be responsible for Nicotine Delivery Product sales regarding any applicable state laws regarding the sale of Nicotine Delivery Products and this regulation.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|45|40:36">
<form.text>The fee for a Nicotine Delivery Product Sales Permit shall be determined by the <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of town__rsqb__</inline.instr> Board of Health annually. All such permits shall be renewed annually by December 31st. Failure to renew this permit by December 31st will result in a late fee. The fee for a Nicotine Delivery Product Sales Permit and the late fee shall be determined by the Town of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of town__rsqb__</inline.instr> Board of Health annually.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|45|40:36">
<form.text>A separate permit is required for each retail establishment selling Nicotine Delivery Products.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|45|40:36">
<form.text>Each Nicotine Delivery Product Sales Permit shall be displayed at the retail establishment in a conspicuous place.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|45|40:36">
<form.text>No Nicotine Delivery Product Sales Permit holder shall allow any employee to sell Nicotine Delivery Products until such employee reads this regulation and any state laws regarding the sale of Nicotine Delivery Products and signs a statement, a copy of which will be placed on file in the office of the employer, that he or she has read the regulation and applicable state laws.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|45|40:36">
<form.text>A Nicotine Delivery Product Sales Permit is nontransferable. A new owner of an establishment that sells Nicotine Delivery Products must apply for a new Nicotine Delivery Product sales permit. No new permit will be issued unless and until all outstanding penalties incurred by the previous permit holder are satisfied in full.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|45|40:36">
<form.text>Issuance of a Nicotine Delivery Product Sales Permit shall be conditioned on an applicant's consent to unannounced, periodic inspections of his or her retail establishment to ensure compliance with this regulation.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|45|40:36">
<form.text>A Nicotine Delivery Product Sales Permit will not be renewed if the permit holder has failed to pay all fines issued and the time period to appeal the fines has expired.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.para>
<form.text>E Nicotine Delivery Product Sales to Minors Prohibited:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|45|40:36">
<form.text>No person shall sell Nicotine Delivery Products or permit Nicotine Delivery Products to be sold to a minor or give Nicotine Delivery Products to a minor.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|45|40:36">
<form.text>Identification: Each person selling or distributing Nicotine Delivery Products shall verify the age of the purchaser by means of government-issued photographic identification containing the bearer's date of birth that the purchaser is 18 years old or older. Verification is required for any person under the age of 27.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|45|40:36">
<form.text>All retail sales of Nicotine Delivery Products must be face-to-face between the seller and the buyer.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.para>
<form.text>F Free Distribution/Sampling/Self-Service Displays/Vending Machines:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>a</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|45|40:36">
<form.text>No person shall distribute, or cause to be distributed, any free samples of Nicotine Delivery Products.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>b</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|45|40:36">
<form.text>No person shall permit any sampling of a Nicotine Delivery Product.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>c</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|45|40:36">
<form.text>All self-service displays of Nicotine Delivery Products are prohibited.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>d</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|45|40:36">
<form.text>Vending machines selling Nicotine Delivery Products are prohibited.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.para>
<form.text>G Use Prohibited:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|45|40:36">
<form.text>The use of e-cigarettes is hereby prohibited in <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of town__rsqb__</inline.instr> in locations and establishments covered by <inline.instr>__lsqb__citation of statute__rsqb__</inline.instr> (commonly known as the “Smoke-free Workplace Law”) and in additional locations and establishments covered by any regulation or ordinance pertaining to the use of tobacco products in <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of town__rsqb__</inline.instr>.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>H Signage:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|45|40:36">
<form.text>The owner or other person in charge of a shop or other place used to sell Nicotine Delivery Products at retail shall conspicuously post a sign stating that “The sale of Nicotine Delivery Products to minors under 18 years of age is prohibited.” The owner or other person in charge of a shop or other place used to sell e-cigarettes at retail shall conspicuously post a sign stating that “The use of e-cigarettes at indoor establishments is prohibited by local law.” The notices shall be no smaller than 8.5&Prime; by 11&Prime; and shall be posted conspicuously in the retail establishment or other place in such a manner so that they may be readily seen by a person standing at or approaching the cash register. These notices shall directly face the purchaser and shall not be obstructed from view or placed at a height of less than four (4) feet or greater than nine (9) feet from the floor.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>I Violations:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|45|40:36">
<form.text>Violations of Sections D and E:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>a</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|45|40:36">
<form.text>It shall be the responsibility of the retailer or his or her business agent to ensure compliance with Sections D and E of this regulation pertaining to the sale and distribution of Nicotine Delivery Products. The violator shall receive:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(i)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|45|40:36">
<form.text>In the case of a first violation, a fine of $<inline.instr>__lsqb__dollar amount of fine__rsqb__</inline.instr>;</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(ii)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|45|40:36">
<form.text>In the case of a second violation within twenty-four (24) months of the date of the current violation, a fine of $<inline.instr>__lsqb__dollar amount of fine__rsqb__</inline.instr> shall be assessed and the Nicotine Delivery Product Sales Permit may be suspended for up to seven (7) consecutive business days after a Board of Health hearing; and</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(iii)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|45|40:36">
<form.text>In the case of three or more violations within a twenty-four (24) month period, a fine of $<inline.instr>__lsqb__dollar amount of fine__rsqb__</inline.instr> shall be assessed and the Nicotine Delivery Product Sales Permit may be suspended for up to thirty (30) consecutive business days after a Board of Health hearing.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>b</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|45|40:36">
<form.text>Refusal to cooperate with inspections pursuant to this regulation shall result in the suspension of any or all Board of Health-issued permits or licenses for thirty (30) consecutive business days.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>c</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|45|40:36">
<form.text>In addition to the monetary fines set above, any permit holder who engages in the sale or distribution of products while his or her permit is suspended shall be subject to the suspension of all board of health issued permits for thirty (30) consecutive business days.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>d</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|45|40:36">
<form.text>The <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of town__rsqb__</inline.instr> Board of Health shall provide notice of the intent to suspend a Nicotine Delivery Product Sales Permit, which notice shall contain the reasons therefore and establish a time and date for a hearing which date shall be no earlier than seven (7) days after the date of said notice. The permit holder or its business agent shall have an opportunity to be heard at such hearing and shall be notified of the Board of Health's decision, and the reasons therefore in writing. After a hearing, the <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of town__rsqb__</inline.instr> Board of Health may suspend the permit if the Board finds that a sale to a minor occurred. For purposes of such suspensions, the Board shall make the determination notwithstanding any separate criminal or noncriminal proceedings brought in court hereunder or under the <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of state__rsqb__</inline.instr> General Laws for the same offense. All Nicotine Delivery Products shall be removed from the retail establishment upon suspension of the Nicotine Delivery Product Sales Permit. Failure to remove all Nicotine Delivery Products shall constitute a separate violation of this regulation.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|45|40:36">
<form.text>Violations of Section F:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>

<form.text>It shall be the responsibility of the retailer or his or her business agent to ensure compliance with Sections F of this regulation pertaining to the free distribution and sampling of Nicotine Delivery Products. The violator shall receive:</form.text>

</form.item>
<form.item>

<designator>(iii)</designator>

<form.text>In the case of three or more violations within a twenty-four (24) month period, a fine of $<inline.instr>__lsqb__dollar amount of fine__rsqb__</inline.instr>.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|45|40:36">
<form.text>Violations of Section G:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>a</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|45|40:36">
<form.text>It shall be the responsibility of the owner, manager, or other person in control of a building, vehicle or vessel to ensure compliance with Section G of this regulation pertaining to the use of e-cigarettes. The violator shall receive:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(i)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|45|40:36">

</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(ii)</designator>
</name.block>

</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(iii)</designator>
</name.block>

</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(iv)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|45|40:36">
<form.text>If an owner, manager or other person in control of a building, vehicle or vessel violates this regulation repeatedly, demonstrating egregious noncompliance, the Board of Health may revoke or suspend the license to operate and shall provide notice of the intent to suspend such license, which notice shall contain the reasons therefore, and establish a time and date for a hearing which date shall be no earlier than seven (7) days after the date of said notice. The owner, manager or its business agent shall have an opportunity to be heard at such hearing and shall be notified of the Board of Health's decision, and the reasons therefore in writing. For purposes of such suspensions, the Board shall make the determination notwithstanding any separate criminal or noncriminal proceedings brought in court hereunder or under the <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of state__rsqb__</inline.instr> General Laws for the same offense.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>b</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|45|40:36">
<form.text>An individual or person who violates Section G by using an e-cigarette in a place where smoking is prohibited shall be subject to a penalty of $<inline.instr>__lsqb__dollar amount of penalty__rsqb__</inline.instr>.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>c</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|45|40:36">
<form.text>Violations may be disposed of by a civil penalty using the noncriminal method of disposition procedures contained in Section 21D of Chapter 40 of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of state__rsqb__</inline.instr> General Law.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|45|40:36">
<form.text>Each calendar day on which a violation occurs shall be considered a separate offense.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|45|40:36">
<form.text>This regulation shall be enforced by the Board of Health and its designees.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|45|40:36">
<form.text>Any person may register a complaint to initiate an investigation and enforcement with the Board of Health, the local inspection department or the equivalent.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.para>
<form.text>J Non Criminal Disposition:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|45|40:36">
<form.text>Whoever violates any provision of this regulation may be penalized by the noncriminal method of disposition as provided in <inline.instr>__lsqb__citation of statute__rsqb__</inline.instr> or by filing a criminal complaint at the appropriate venue. Each day any violation exists shall be deemed to be a separate offense.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>K Enforcement:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|45|40:36">
<form.text>Enforcement of this regulation shall be by the Board of Health of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of town__rsqb__</inline.instr> or its designated agent(s). Any citizen who desires to register a complaint pursuant to the regulation may do so by contacting the Board of Health of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of town__rsqb__</inline.instr> or its designated agent(s) and the Board shall investigate.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>L Severability:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|45|40:36">
<form.text>If any provision of these regulations is declared invalid or unenforceable, the other provisions shall not be affected thereby but shall continue in full force and effect.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>M Effective Date:</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.unit>
</para>
</form>

<section.body>
<form uuid="I112cdf70de9e11e49388e1a20ea50594">
<form.unit>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 1 Definitions</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>p.fl="none">As used in this Article, the following words and phrases shall have the following meanings:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>p.fl="none">Bonded Agent. A person in <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of state__rsqb__</inline.instr> who is an agent of a person outside this state and receives electronic cigarettes in interstate commerce and stores the electronic cigarettes for distribution or delivery to distributors under orders from the person outside this state.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>p.fl="none">Consumer. A person who possesses electronic cigarettes for personal consumption.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>p.fl="none">Distributor. A person who:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>is authorized to purchase for the purpose of making a first sale in <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of state__rsqb__</inline.instr> electronic cigarettes from manufacturers who distribute electronic cigarettes in <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of state__rsqb__</inline.instr>;</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>ships, transports, imports into this <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of state__rsqb__</inline.instr>, acquires, or possesses electronic cigarettes and makes a first sale of the electronic cigarettes in <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of state__rsqb__</inline.instr>;</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>manufactures or produces electronic cigarettes; or</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>is an importer or import broker.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>p.fl="none">Electronic Cigarette. Any electronic device composed primarily of a mouthpiece, heating element, battery, or electronic circuit, that provides, or is manufactured, intended to provide or advertised as providing, a vapor of liquid nicotine and/or a combination of liquid nicotine and any other substance which is delivered or deliverable by inhalation. This term shall include every version and type of such devices whether they are manufactured or marketed as electronic cigarettes, e- cigarettes, electronic cigars, e- cigars, electronic pipes, e- pipes, or under any other product name or description. This term shall include any accessories or components of an electronic cigarette and any liquid nicotine, or any other substance intended, manufactured or designed to be combined with liquid nicotine for use in an electronic cigarette.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>p.fl="none">Minor. A person under the age of 18 years of age.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>p.fl="none">Person. An individual, corporation, partnership, wholesaler, retailer or any licensed or unlicensed business.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>p.fl="none">Possession. To have on or about the person or otherwise exercise actual care, custody, management or control over a tangible object or substance.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>p.fl="none">Retailer. A person who engages in the practice of selling electronic cigarettes to consumers and includes the owner of a coin-operated electronic cigarette vending machine.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>p.fl="none">Retail sale. A transfer of possession from a retailer to a consumer in connection with a purchase, sale, or exchange for value of electronic cigarettes.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>p.fl="none">Wholesaler. A person, including a manufacturer' s representative, who sells or distributes electronic cigarettes in <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of state__rsqb__</inline.instr> for resale but who is not a distributor.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 2 Use of Electronic Cigarettes in City Facilities</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>p.fl="none">Use of electronic cigarettes in any manner by any person within the confines of the interior areas of the <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of city__rsqb__</inline.instr> Municipal Complex, the <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of city__rsqb__</inline.instr> Public Library, inside the water tower, and all City parks and recreation buildings shall be and is hereby declared to be unlawful, and any person violating, causing or permitting this Section to be violated shall be guilty of a class C misdemeanor, and on conviction may be punished by a fine in accordance with the general penalty provision found in Section 9 of this Code. Each day that the violation continues shall constitute a separate offense.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 3 Use of Electronic Cigarettes in Public Places</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>p.fl="none">It is an offense for a person to use an electronic cigarette in a facility of a public primary or secondary school or an elevator, enclosed theater or movie house, library, museum, hospital, transit system bus, or intrastate bus, Transportation Code, plane, or train which is a public place. It is a defense to prosecution under this Section that the conveyance or public place in which the offense takes place does not have prominently displayed a reasonably sized notice that the use of electronic cigarettes is prohibited by city ordinance, or smoking is prohibited by state law, in such conveyance or public place and that an offense is punishable by a fine not to exceed $<inline.instr>__lsqb__dollar amount of fine__rsqb__</inline.instr>. It is an exception to the application of this Section if the person uses the electronic cigarette exclusively within an area designated for smoking tobacco or using electronic cigarettes or using as a participant in an authorized theatrical performance. An offense under this Section is a class C misdemeanor.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 4 Possession of Electronic Cigarettes by Minors Prohibited</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>p.fl="none">A minor commits an offense if the minor possesses an electronic cigarette.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 5 Defenses</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>p.fl="none">It is a defense to a prosecution for violation of Section 4 of this Article that a minor possessed an electronic cigarette:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>While in the course and scope of the minor' s employment by a business that is a distributor, wholesaler, bonded agent or retailer of electronic cigarettes; or</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>In the presence of an adult, parent, guardian, spouse who is eighteen (18) years of age or older, or other adult eighteen (18) years of age or older to whom the minor has been committed by a court of competent jurisdiction.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 6 Purchase of Electronic Cigarettes by Minors Prohibited</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>p.fl="none">It is an offense for a minor to purchase an electronic cigarette. It is a defense to prosecution under this Section that the minor purchased an electronic cigarette in the presence of an adult parent, guardian, spouse, or other adult to whom the minor has been committed by a court of competent jurisdiction.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 7 Purchase of Electronic Cigarettes by Minors Using False Information</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>p.fl="none">It is an offense for a minor, in order to acquire an electronic cigarette, to state to any person engaged in the business of selling electronic cigarettes that such minor is not a minor, or to present to any such person a document or writing that purports to establish that such minor is not a minor.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 8 Sale or Transfer of Electronic Cigarettes to Minors Prohibited; Proof of Age Required</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>It shall be unlawful for any person to sell, transfer or give an electronic cigarette to a minor.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>It shall be unlawful for any person to sell, transfer or give an electronic cigarette to another person who intends to deliver the electronic cigarette to a minor.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>If an offense under this Section occurs in connection with a sale by an employee of the owner of a store in which electronic cigarettes are sold at retail, the employee is criminally responsible for the offense and is subject to prosecution.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>It is a defense to prosecution under Subsection (a) if the person to whom the electronic cigarette was sold, transferred or given presented to the defendant what reasonably appears to be valid proof of identification indicating that the person was not a minor.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>A proof of identification satisfies the requirements of Subsection (d) if it contains a physical description and photograph consistent with the person's appearance, purports to establish that the person is eighteen (18) years of age or older, and was issued by a governmental agency. The proof of identification may include a driver's license issued by any state, a passport, or an identification card issued by a state or the federal government.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 9 Warning Notice</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>Each person who sells electronic cigarettes at retail or by vending machine shall post a sign in a location that is conspicuous to all employees and customers and that is located in close proximity to the location at which the electronic cigarettes may be purchased.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>The sign must include the statement:</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>The sign required by Subsection (b) must be printed in bold and black letters in twenty-eight (28) point font on a white background.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 10 Notification to Employees and Agents</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>Each retailer shall notify each individual employed by that retailer who is to be engaged in retail sales of electronic cigarettes that the municipal ordinance prohibits and requires the following:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>Prohibits the sale or distribution of electronic cigarettes to any person who is younger than 18 years of age as provided by Section 8 and that a violation of that Section is a Class C misdemeanor; and</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>Requires each person who sells electronic cigarettes at retail or by vending machine to post a warning notice as provided by Section 9, requires each employee to ensure that the appropriate sign is always properly displayed while that employee is exercising the employee' s duties, and provides that a violation of Section 9 is a Class C misdemeanor.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>The notice required by Subsection (a) must be provided prior to the date an individual begins to engage in retail sales of electronic cigarettes. The individual shall signify that the individual has received the notice required by Subsection (a) by signing a form stating that the law has been fully explained, that the individual understands the law, and that the individual, as a condition of employment, agrees to comply with the law.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>Each form signed by an individual under this Section shall indicate the date of the signature and the current address, contact phone number, driver's license number, and social security number of the individual. The retailer shall retain the form signed by each individual employed as a retail sales clerk until the 60th day after the date the individual has left the employer's employ.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>A retailer required by this Section to notify employees commits an offense if the retailer fails, on demand of a peace officer or the Director of Public Works, to produce the forms prescribed by this Section.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>It is a defense to prosecution under Subsection (d) to show proof that the employee did complete, sign, and date the forms required by Subsections (b) and (c). Proof must be shown to the Director of Public Works no later than the seventh day after the date of a demand under Subsection(d).</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 11 Vendor Assisted Sales Required; Vending Machines</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>Except as provided by Subsection (b), a retailer or other person may not:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>offer electronic cigarettes for sale in a manner that permits a customer direct access to the cigarettes or tobacco products; or</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>install or maintain a vending machine containing electronic cigarettes</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>Subsection (a) does not apply to:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>a facility or business that is not open to persons younger than 18 years of age at any time; or</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>a premises for which a person holds a package store permit issued under the Alcoholic Beverage Code.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 12 Sale of Electronic Cigarettes Prohibited</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>It shall be unlawful for any person, firm or corporation to sell or offer for sale an electronic cigarette.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>Nonconforming Uses.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>A period of two (2) year(s) subsequent to the adoption of this Article is hereby established for the abatement of any person, firm or corporation engaged in the business of selling or offering for sale electronic cigarettes, which was legally existing prior to said date, but which has become nonconforming as a result of the regulations contained herein.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>Any person, firm or corporation engaged in the business of selling or offering for sale electronic cigarettes, which was legally existing prior to the adoption of this Article must provide written notice to the Director of Public Works within ninety (90) days of the adoption of this Article or be subject to immediate abatement.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>Any nonconforming use may be continued in operation on the same land area and on the same floor area in a structure or structures which were occupied by the nonconforming use on the adoption of this Article.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>A nonconforming use is terminated by the following means:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>By abandonment. Voluntary abandonment of a nonconforming use shall terminate immediately the right to operate such use;</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>By violation of Chapter. Any one of the following violations of this Chapter shall terminate immediately the right to operate a nonconforming use:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>Changing a nonconforming use to another nonconforming use except as herein provided and authorized;</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>Increasing either or both the land area or the floor area occupied by a nonconforming use, except as herein provided and authorized; or</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>Changing a nonconforming use to an unlawful use; or</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>By specific acts of termination. Any one of the following specific acts of termination shall terminate immediately the right to operate a nonconforming use:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>Changing a nonconforming use to a conforming use;</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>Changing a nonconforming use to another nonconforming use as herein provided and authorized; provided, however, that the termination shall apply only to the nonconforming use existing prior to any change;</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>Non operation or non use of a non conforming use for a period of six (6) or more successive calendar months; or</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>Vacancy or discontinuance for a period of six (6) or more successive calendar months of the structure or that part of a structure occupied by the nonconforming use;</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|46|40:36.50">
<form.text>The abatement period established in Subsection (b)(1) herein is subject to appeal to the City Council by written notice delivered to the City Secretary prior to the expiration of two (2) year(s) after the adoption of this Article.</form.text>

<form.text>Section 1 Prohibitions</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>1</designator>
<name>01.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|47|40:36.60">
<form.text>Smoking, as defined in <inline.instr>__lsqb__citation of statute__rsqb__</inline.instr>, and the use of Electronic cigarettes (e-cigarettes, e-cigs, and Electronic water pipes), vaporizers and vapor products are prohibited in the following locations:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(A)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|47|40:36.60">
<form.text>An enclosed area of a structure in which the public is invited or permitted (public place) including, but not limited to:</form.text>
</form.para>

<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|47|40:36.60">

<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|47|40:36.60">

</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|47|40:36.60">
<form.text>Bingo facilities;</form.text>
</form.para>

<form.text>Child care and adult day care facilities;</form.text>
</form.para>

<form.text>convention facilities;</form.text>
</form.para>

<form.text>all restrooms, lobbies, reception areas, hallways, and other common-use areas of such structures and facilities.</form.text>

<designator>(B)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|47|40:36.60">

</form.para>

</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>1</designator>
<name>02.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|47|40:36.60">
<form.text>An employer shall inform each of the employer's employees and prospective employees of this ordinance's prohibition as it applies to the place of employment.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 2 Exceptions</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>2</designator>
<name>01.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|47|40:36.60">
<form.text>Smoking, as defined in <inline.instr>__lsqb__citation of statute__rsqb__</inline.instr>, and the use of Electronic cigarettes (e- cigarettes, e-cigs, and Electronic water pipes), vaporizers and vapor products may be allowed in the following locations:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(A)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|47|40:36.60">
<form.text>Clubs, Fraternal Clubs and Labor Organizations.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(B)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|47|40:36.60">
<form.text>A premises owned or leased as a private residence, unless such is used as a licensed childcare, adult day care, or health care facility.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(C)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|47|40:36.60">
<form.text>Tobacco specialty bars, tobacco retail stores, and vape shops.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(D)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|47|40:36.60">
<form.text>None of the areas set forth as an Exception shall be exempt from the provisions of this Ordinance if smoke from any area enters, either directly or indirectly, through entrances, windows, ventilation systems, or other means, an area where smoking is otherwise prohibited by this Ordinance.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(E)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|47|40:36.60">
<form.text>An establishment owned or leased by a business that was in operation and permitted smoking and/or vaping on January 1, 2018, and has continuously permitted smoking and/or vaping, provided the business meets the following requirements:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|47|40:36.60">
<form.text>The business prohibits entry by patrons who are less than twenty-one (21) years of age.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|47|40:36.60">
<form.text>The business owner or operator holds a beer, liquor or wine retailer's permit.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>2</designator>
<name>02.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|47|40:36.60">
<form.text>The owner, operator, manager, or official in charge of an establishment or premises in which smoking or vaping is allowed shall post conspicuous signs in the establishment that read “WARNING: Smoking Or Vaping Is Allowed In This Establishment,” or other similar language.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>

<form.para>
<form.text>Section 4 Definitions</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>4</designator>
<name>01.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|47|40:36.60">
<form.text>Electronic cigarette means a device that is capable of providing an inhalable dose of nicotine or any other substance intended for human consumption by delivering a vaporized solution that can be used by a person to simulate smoking through inhalation of vapor or aerosol from the device. The term includes the components and cartridges.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>4</designator>
<name>02.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|47|40:36.60">
<form.text>Vapor product means a powered vaporizer that converts e-liquid to a vapor intended for inhalation through an Electronic cigarette or an Electronic water pipe.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>4</designator>
<name>03.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|47|40:36.60">
<form.text>E-liquid means a substance that:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(A)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|47|40:36.60">
<form.text>may or may not contain nicotine; and</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(B)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|47|40:36.60">
<form.text>is intended to be vaporized and inhaled using a vapor product.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>4</designator>
<name>04.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|47|40:36.60">
<form.text>Vaping means the process of inhalation or exhalation of the Electronic cigarette, e-cigs, Electronic water pipe, and vaporizers.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>4</designator>
<name>05.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|47|40:36.60">
<form.text>E-cigs or E-cigarettes are other terms used to refer to Electronic cigarettes.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>4</designator>
<name>06.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|47|40:36.60">
<form.text>Electronic water pipe means a device that is capable of providing an inhalable dose of nicotine or any other substance through water intended for human consumption by delivering a vaporized solution that can be used by a person to simulate smoking through inhalation of vapor or aerosol from the device.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>4</designator>
<name>07.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|47|40:36.60">
<form.text>Vaporizer means a device like an Electronic cigarette that is used to inhale thee-liquid.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>4</designator>
<name>08.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|47|40:36.60">
<form.text>Clubs means an association or corporation that:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(A)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|47|40:36.60">
<form.text>Organized under the authority of law;</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(B)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|47|40:36.60">
<form.text>Been in active, continuous existence for at least three (3) years;</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(C)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|47|40:36.60">
<form.text>Maintained a membership roll for a three (3) year period;</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(D)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|47|40:36.60">
<form.text>Shall have a paid-up membership of more than fifty (50) members;</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(E)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|47|40:36.60">
<form.text>Shall be the owner, lessee, or occupant of an establishment operated solely for objects of a national, social, patriotic, political, or athletic nature, or the like;</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(F)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|47|40:36.60">
<form.text>Shall not be operated for financial gain;</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(G)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|47|40:36.60">
<form.text>The property and advantages belong to its members; and</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(H)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|47|40:36.60">
<form.text>It shall maintain an establishment provided with special space and accommodations where, in consideration of payment, food, with or without lodging, is habitually served.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>4</designator>
<name>09.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|47|40:36.60">
<form.text>Fraternal Clubs; Labor Organizations means an association or corporation whose membership is comprised of or forms:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(A)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|47|40:36.60">
<form.text>A lodge or local chapter or corresponding unit of a fraternal order or of another association of a like nature, or a body whose membership is comprised of persons who have served in the armed forces of the United States;</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(B)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|47|40:36.60">
<form.text>Has been in continual existence on a national scale for more than five (5) years;</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(C)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|47|40:36.60">
<form.text>Fraternal clubs and labor organizations need not meet the requirements of the definition of “Clubs,” but are considered clubs for all other purposes.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>4</designator>
<name>10.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|47|40:36.60">
<form.text>Bars and Taverns means an establishment that meets the following conditions:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(A)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|47|40:36.60">
<form.text>Holds one or more of the following licenses:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|47|40:36.60">
<form.text>a beer retailer's permit under <inline.instr>__lsqb__citation of code__rsqb__</inline.instr>;</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|47|40:36.60">
<form.text>a liquor retailer's permit under <inline.instr>__lsqb__citation of code__rsqb__</inline.instr>; or</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|47|40:36.60">
<form.text>a wine retailer's permit under <inline.instr>__lsqb__citation of code__rsqb__</inline.instr>;</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(B)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|47|40:36.60">
<form.text>Does not employ an individual who is less than eighteen (18) years of age;</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(C)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|47|40:36.60">
<form.text>Does not allow individuals less than twenty-one (21) years of age to enter.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</para>
</form>
</section.body>
