<section.body>
<form uuid="I441007f02f4f11e3947f0000837bc6dd">
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(a)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>Definitions.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>The following words and phrases, whenever used in this section, shall be construed as defined in this subsection:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(1)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>“Business” means any sole proprietorship, partnership, joint venture, corporation or other business entity formed for profit-making or nonprofit-making purposes, including retail establishments where goods or services are sold as well as professional corporations and other entities where legal, medical, dental, engineering, architectural or other professional services are delivered.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(2)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>“Child-care facility” means any licensed nursery, day care center, preschool, or other facility engaged in the practice of providing care for children.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(3)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>“Common work area” means an area within a place of employment where two or more people perform job-related tasks that is not separated by solid walls from floor to ceiling on all sides.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(4)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>“Designated smoking area” means an enclosed area where smoking is permitted, or an area outside of facilities, that is identified by proper signage.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(5)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>“Dining area” means any enclosed area containing a counter or tables upon which meals are served.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(6)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>“Eating establishment” means an establishment engaged in the business of regularly and customarily selling food, primarily to be eaten on the premises. Eating establishments shall include businesses that are referred to as restaurants, cafeterias, or cafes. Eating establishments shall also include lunch stands, grills, snack bars, fast-food businesses, and other establishments, such as drugstores, which have a lunch counter or other section where food is sold to be eaten on the premises.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(7)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>“Educational facility” means any facility that is used for the principal purpose of providing instruction or training in a trade, craft, business skill; or athletic or sports activity; or of providing child care; or primary, secondary, or higher education.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(8)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>“Employee” means any person who is employed by any employer in the consideration for direct or indirect monetary wages or profit, and any person who volunteers his or her services.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(9)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>“Employer” means any person, business, partnership, corporation, including a municipal corporation, or nonprofit entity, who employs the services of one or more individual persons.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(10)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>“Enclosed area” means all space between a floor and ceiling which is enclosed on all sides by solid walls or windows (exclusive of door or passage ways) which extend from the floor to the ceiling, including all space therein screened by partitions which do not extend to the ceiling or are not solid, or similar structures.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(11)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>“Health-care facility” means any facility associated with the rendition of health care, including, but not limited to, laboratories, hospitals, public and private health care facilities.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(12)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>“Nonsmoking area” means an area of an eating establishment where smoking is prohibited.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(13)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>“Overnight or emergency shelter” means any facility providing temporary shelter for homeless or transient individuals.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(14)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>“Place of employment” means any enclosed area which employees normally frequent during the course of employment, including, but not limited to, work areas, employee lounges and restrooms, conference rooms and classrooms, employee cafeterias and hallways.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(a)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>A private residence is not a “place of employment” unless it is used as a licensed child care facility, licensed health care facility, or domiciliary home.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(b)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>The dining area of an eating establishment is not a “place of employment.”</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(15)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>“Public place” means any enclosed area in which the public is permitted.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(16)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>“Retail tobacco store” means a retail store utilized primarily for the sale of tobacco products and accessories and in which the sale of other products is merely incidental.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(17)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>“Smoking” means inhaling, exhaling, burning, or carrying any lighted cigar, cigarette, or other tobacco product in any manner or in any form.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(18)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>“Sports facility” means an enclosed sports facility, including, but not limited to, sports pavilions, gymnasiums, health spas, boxing arenas, swimming pools, roller and ice skating rinks, where members of the general public assemble either to engage in or witness physical exercise or events.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(19)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>“Art/entertainment facility” includes but is not limited to “theaters,” meaning any enclosed facility engaged in the business of exhibiting motion pictures, plays or performances to an audience; concert halls, art galleries, auditoriums, indoor recreational areas, libraries, and museums.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(20)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>“Domiciliary home” means a long-term care facility licensed under that name and classification by the Division of Facility Services of the <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of state__rsqb__</inline.instr> Department of Human Resources.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(b)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>Prohibition of Smoking in Public Places.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(1)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>Except as otherwise provided, smoking shall be prohibited within the following public places:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(a)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>Art/entertainment facilities;</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(b)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>Enclosed shopping malls;</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(c)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>Educational facilities;</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(d)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>Elevators;</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(e)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>Health care facilities except when exempted by order of a licensed physician and when the smoking occurs in a room separate from any room in which a nonsmoking patient or resident is present or resides;</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(f)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>Pharmacies;</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(g)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>Public transportation vehicles;</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(h)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>Restrooms; and</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(i)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>Sports facilities.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(2)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>Clear and conspicuous signs shall be posted in every building or other place where smoking is regulated by this section.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(c)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>Regulation of Smoking in Places of Employment.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>Employers shall make reasonable provisions for smoke-free air for nonsmoking employees. Each employer shall have the right to designate any place of employment as a nonsmoking place of employment. Each employer having a place of employment located within the City of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of city__rsqb__</inline.instr> shall adopt a written policy related to smoking and shall clearly designate smoking areas by appropriate signage in accordance with subsection (k) of this section. Each employer shall supply a written copy of the smoking policy to any present or prospective employee upon request.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(d)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>Regulation of Smoking in Public Places of Businesses and Retail Establishments.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(1)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>Public places in each business, retail service establishment and retail store shall be designated, by the owner or operator, as nonsmoking or smoking areas. Smoking is not permitted in designated nonsmoking areas.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(2)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>Clear and conspicuous signage shall be posted at the entrance to each business, retail service establishment and retail store to alert the public as to the designation made.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(e)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>Regulation of Smoking in Eating Establishments.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(1)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>All eating establishments with a seating capacity of 30 or more patrons shall designate nonsmoking areas. The seating capacity of any bar or lounge located within the dining area of an eating establishment shall be included in the calculation of the total capacity of the eating establishment.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(a)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>Eating establishments with a seating capacity of 30 or more patrons shall have posted a conspicuous sign or signs clearly stating that a nonsmoking area is available in accordance with subsection (k) of this section.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(b)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>The nonsmoking area shall be separate and contiguous, containing at all times one-third or more of the seating capacity of the dining area.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(2)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>Eating establishments with a seating capacity of fewer than thirty (30) patrons shall designate the entire facility as either smoking or nonsmoking and post signage to that effect at the patron entrance.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(3)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>Notwithstanding any other provision of this section, any owner, operator, manager or other person who controls any eating establishment described in this section may declare the entire eating establishment as a nonsmoking eating establishment.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(f)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>Regulation of Smoking in Domiciliary Homes.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>Domiciliary homes may permit smoking in common lounge areas or in private residential quarters so long as similar nonsmoking common facilities are available and so long as nonsmoking private residential quarters are provided if desired by any residents.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(g)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>Regulation of Smoking in Retail Tobacco Stores.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>Smoking is permitted in retail tobacco stores when related to the testing and sale of tobacco products.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(h)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>Regulation of Smoking in Overnight and Emergency Shelters.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>Smoking is prohibited in overnight and emergency shelters except in designated smoking areas. Designated smoking areas may be established provided that they are separate from sleeping quarters.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(i)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>Regulation of Smoking in Bowling Facilities.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>No smoking shall be allowed within any area which is less than twenty (20) feet from the foul line of any bowling lane. No smoking shall be allowed in any restroom facility located in a bowling facility. Smoking may be permitted in any other part of a bowling facility so long as one-third of the seats in any dining facility and one-third of the spectator seating is designated as a nonsmoking area. The nonsmoking areas shall be separate and contiguous.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(j)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>Exclusions.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>The following areas shall not be subject to the smoking restrictions of this section:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(1)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>Private residences.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(2)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>Eating establishments (or portion thereof), hotel rooms, conference or meeting rooms, and public transportation vehicles while these places are being rented for private functions.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(3)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>State and Federal facilities.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(k)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>Signage.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(1)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>“No smoking,” or other signs relating to an establishment's smoking policy, whichever are appropriate, shall have letters of not less than one inch in height or the international “No Smoking” symbol (consisting of a pictorial representation of a burning cigarette enclosed in a red circle with a red bar across it).</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(2)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>Signs shall be conspicuously posted by the owner, operator, or manager of a regulated place or building in a position clearly visible on entry into every building, and within facilities, where smoking is regulated.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(3)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>No person shall remove or deface any placard required to be erected by or under the authority of this section.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(l)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>Enforcement.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>The proprietor, employer, or other person in charge of a public place or place of employment where smoking is regulated shall make reasonable efforts to prevent smoking in nonsmoking areas.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(m)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>Administration.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">
<form.text>If any person willfully smokes in violation of this section, he or she shall be subject to a civil penalty of $<inline.instr>__lsqb__dollar amount of penalty__rsqb__</inline.instr> per violation.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(n)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|58|40:43">

<section>
<section.front>
<outline.name.block>
<label>&sect;</label>
<designator>40:43.30</designator>
<name>Smoking lounges, fire safety measures</name>
</outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>LGV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>ORD</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>GVT</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>AMT</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FDS</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FRE</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="I1130fe20de9e11e49388e1a20ea50594">
<form.unit>
<form.para>
<form.text>(a) Definitions.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|59|40:43.30">
<form.text>“Smoke” or “Smoking” means the direct or indirect burning, lighting or heating of any flavored or unflavored tobacco or plant product intended or used for inhalation, exhalation, or other intake by a person, or possession of any device, equipment, or mechanism that permits or causes such activity.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|59|40:43.30">
<form.text>“Smoking Lounge” means an establishment that allows Smoking on the premises, unless the establishment is exempt from the <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of state__rsqb__</inline.instr> Indoor Clean Air Act for any reason except the “Tobacco Shop” exemption. The term “Smoking Lounge” includes, but is not limited to, facilities commonly described as tobacco retail specialty stores, cigar bars and lounges, hookah bars, caf&eacute;és and lounges, tobacco bars and lounges, tobacco clubs and 0% nicotine establishments.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|59|40:43.30">
<form.text>“Minor” means any person under eighteen (18) years of age.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.para>
<form.text>(b) License Required</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|59|40:43.30">
<form.text>It is unlawful for any person or other entity to operate or maintain a Smoking Lounge in the City unless the owner, operator or lessee thereof has obtained a Smoking Lounge business license from the City, or to operate such business after such license has been revoked or suspended by the City.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|59|40:43.30">
<form.text>The license year for all fees required herein is from January 1 through December 31. The application for a license must be accompanied by payment in full of the fee stated herein by cash, certified or cashier's check, or money order, and no application will be considered complete until such fee is paid.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>a</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|59|40:43.30">
<form.text>All licenses must be issued for a specific location and will be nontransferable, and license fees are nonrefundable</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>b</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|59|40:43.30">
<form.text>The fee for a Smoking Lounge business license is $<inline.instr>__lsqb__dollar amount of fee__rsqb__</inline.instr> for the first year's license, and $<inline.instr>__lsqb__dollar amount of renewal fee__rsqb__</inline.instr> yearly renewal fee.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|59|40:43.30">
<form.text>The Smoking Lounge business license must be prominently and conspicuously displayed at all times on the premises of the Smoking Lounge.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.para>
<form.text>(c) Disqualifying Criminal History</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|59|40:43.30">
<form.text>No Smoking Lounge license will be granted to owners, operators, or lessees who have any convictions, including diverted, deferred, and expunged convictions, for any criminal offense involving drugs or controlled substances.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>a</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|59|40:43.30">
<form.text>In the event of corporate or other business entity ownership, no member, partner, or shareholder of the company may have any convictions, including diverted, deferred, and expunged convictions, for any criminal offense involving drugs or controlled substances.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>b</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|59|40:43.30">
<form.text>Any convictions, including diverted, deferred, and expunged convictions, for any criminal offense involving drugs or controlled substances after a Smoking Lounge license is granted shall be grounds for immediate revocation of the Smoking Lounge license.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|59|40:43.30">
<form.text>All applicants, owners, operators, lessees and employees hereby consent to background checks for disqualifying criminal history during the application process and at any time while the license is valid.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|59|40:43.30">
<form.text>All applicants, owners, operators, lessees and employees must inform the City Clerk in writing within 10 days of any conviction, including diverted, deferred, and expunged convictions, for any criminal offense involving drugs or controlled substances.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.para>
<form.text>(d) Inspection; Law Enforcement Access</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|59|40:43.30">
<form.text>Applying for a Smoking Lounge license constitutes consent to inspection by City department officials, including but not limited to fire department, law enforcement and code enforcement officials during business hours to ensure compliance with the requirements of the City Code. Such inspection must be conducted prior to the granting of a Smoking Lounge business license and anytime thereafter as long as a Smoking Lounge license exists.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|59|40:43.30">
<form.text>At any time during hours open to the public, and without notice, the Smoking Lounge may be inspected by City law enforcement and/or fire department personnel to ensure compliance with the requirements of the City code. Failure to permit law enforcement and fire department personnel immediate and unfettered access shall be grounds for immediate revocation of the Smoking Lounge license.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|59|40:43.30">
<form.text>Violations of the fire code, building code, life safety code, City or state statutes or any requirements of this section shall be grounds for immediate revocation of the Smoking Lounge license.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.para>
<form.text>(e) Additional Requirements</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|59|40:43.30">
<form.text>Any building or establishment used or intended for use as a Smoking Lounge must be monitored off site by interconnected and properly functioning smoke detectors in each room of the building or establishment, regardless of size.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|59|40:43.30">
<form.text>Smoking Lounges must be closed to the public and private gatherings between the hours of 2:00 a.m. and 7:00 a.m.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|59|40:43.30">
<form.text>Minors must be prohibited from entering or remaining on the premises at all times.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|59|40:43.30">
<form.text>Without limiting any other requirement, a Smoking Lounge license shall not be granted for any establishment or premises that has a Cereal Malt Beverage license for consumption on premises.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.para>
<form.text>Section 2.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.unit>
</para>

<section>
<section.front>
<outline.name.block>
<label>&sect;</label>
<designator>40:43.50</designator>
<name>Smoking lounges</name>
</outline.name.block>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="I07639580a9d211e382e6d7b2e27ffd14">
<form.unit>
<form.para>
<form.text>DIVISION 1 GENERALLY</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>Since the State of <inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of state__rsqb__</inline.instr> enacted Public Act <inline.instr>__lsqb__statutory section__rsqb__</inline.instr> to prohibit smoking in public places smoking lounges have become increasingly popular. Cigar Bars and Tobacco Specialty Retail Stores that qualify and were in existence on <inline.instr>__lsqb__effective date__rsqb__</inline.instr>, are exempt from the smoking in public prohibition. The State issues exemption certificates that may be transferred resulting in an increase in the number of establishments in the Township. Potential adverse impacts associated with these establishments have been identified such as large numbers of patrons during the evening and night time, crowds overflowing into parking areas and impeding on nearby businesses, leaving behind trash, broken alcohol bottles and debris, incidents requiring police response, fights, alcohol possession on unlicensed premises, traffic, noise, and complaints from neighboring businesses and residents. The purpose of this article is to regulate smoking lounges for the public health, safety, and welfare of the Township and persons within its jurisdictional boundaries; to prevent access to tobacco and non tobacco smoking products by minors at these establishments, and to prevent the spread of smoke fumes to adjacent properties, and persons passing by these establishments. This article is designed to establish reasonable and uniform regulations to prevent potential adverse impacts relating to these establishments. The regulations adopted are designed to provide objective and orderly procedures for the administration of this article.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>For purposes of this article, the words, terms, and phrases shall be defined as follows:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>Cigar shall mean any roll of tobacco weighing three (3) or more pounds per 1,000, which roll has a wrapper or cover consisting of tobacco.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>Cigar bar shall mean an establishment or area within an establishment that is open to the public and is designated for the smoking of cigars that has a State issued exemption certificate.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>Disqualifying criminal act shall mean any of the following:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(1)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>An offense punishable by death or imprisonment in excess of one year under any of the following statutes, as amended, for which less than seven (7) years elapsed since the date of conviction or the date of release from confinement for the conviction, whichever is the later date: <inline.instr>__lsqb__statutory section__rsqb__</inline.instr></form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(2)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>Any attempt, solicitation, or conspiracy to commit one of the foregoing offenses; or</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(3)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>Any offense enumerated in the Township Code of Ordinances which substantially corresponds to one of the foregoing state offenses; or</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(4)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>Any offense in another jurisdiction that, had the predicate act(s) been committed in <inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of state__rsqb__</inline.instr>, would have constituted any of the foregoing offenses.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>Influential interest shall mean any of the following:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(1)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>actual power to operate or control the operation, management, or policies of a current or prospective business; or</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(2)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>ownership of a financial interest in the business, or ownership of an interest that is ten percent (10%) or more of the total interest of a current or prospective business, including such business entities as a firm, partnership, limited partnership, association, limited liability company, or corporation; or</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(3)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>holding an office, such as, e.g., president, vice president, secretary, treasurer, managing member, managing director, etc., in a legal entity which operates a current or prospective business.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>Minor shall mean any person under eighteen (18) years of age.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>Non tobacco smoking products or substances shall include any product or substance that can be consumed by smoking such as, but is not limited to: e-cigarettes, bidis, kreteks, clover cigarettes, herbal cigarettes, electronic and herbal hookah, steam stones, smoking gels or other smoked product.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>Premises shall mean the location for which a smoking lounge establishment operates under a State issued exemption certificate and includes the land, and all improvements located thereon, including the primary building and all accessory and out-buildings, and is not limited to the smoking area.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>Sale shall mean, the exchange, barter, traffic, furnishing, or giving away of tobacco products and non tobacco smoking products and substances which is regulated by the State of <inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of state__rsqb__</inline.instr> and pursuant to this article.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>Smoking lounge shall mean an establishment, which has a State issued smoking ban exemption certificate, and that allows smoking of tobacco products or non tobacco products or substances on the premises. The term “smoking lounge” includes, but is not limited to, facilities commonly described as tobacco retail specialty stores, cigar bars and lounges, hookah caf&eacute;és and lounges, tobacco bars and lounges, tobacco clubs or 0% nicotine establishments.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>State shall mean the State of <inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of state__rsqb__</inline.instr>.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>State issued exemption certificate shall mean a valid exemption certificate issued by the State of <inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of state__rsqb__</inline.instr> for the premises, from the smoking in public ban which allows indoor smoking on the premises in compliance with the Act.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>Tobacco product shall mean a product that contains tobacco and is intended for human consumption, including, but not limited to, cigars, cigarettes, noncigarette smoking tobacco or smokeless tobacco as defined by the Tobacco Products Tax Act.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>Tobacco specialty retail store shall mean an establishment that has a State issued exemption certificate and for which the primary purpose is the retail sale of tobacco products, nontobacco smoking products and substances, and smoking paraphernalia.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.para>
<form.text>DIVISION 2 LICENSE</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>A person shall not operate a smoking lounge in the Township without first obtaining a smoking lounge business license issued pursuant to the provisions of this article.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(a)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>An applicant for a smoking lounge license shall annually file in person at the office of the Township Clerk, a completed application made on a form provided by the Clerk. The application shall be signed as required herein and shall be notarized. An application shall be considered complete when it contains, for each person required to sign the application, the information and/or items required in paragraphs (1) through (8) below, accompanied by the required fee.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(1)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>The applicant's full true name and any other names used by the applicant in the preceding seven (7) years. If the applicant is a partnership, corporation, limited liability company, or other legal entity, then all persons with an influential interest in the entity shall be deemed an applicant and shall provide the information required by this article. Each applicant must be qualified under section 2.3, and each applicant shall be considered a licensee if a license is granted.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(2)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>Current business address or another mailing address of the applicant.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(3)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>Written proof of identity, in the form of a driver's license or a copy of a birth certificate accompanied by a picture identification document issued by a governmental agency.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(4)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>The business name, location, zoning classification, legal description, parcel identification number, mailing address and phone number.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(5)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>A copy of the State issued exemption certificate for the premises; or if a transfer has been applied for, a copy of the application filed with the State.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(6)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>The name and business address of the designated local agent who is responsible to supervise the premises and activities and who is authorized to receive service of process.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(7)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>A statement of whether any applicant has been convicted of or has pled guilty or nolo contendere to a disqualifying criminal act as defined in this article, and if so, specify each criminal act involved, including the date, place, and jurisdiction of each, as well as, the dates of conviction and release from confinement, where applicable.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(8)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>A statement as to whether any business in which an applicant has had an influential interest, has, in the previous seven (7) years, and at the time during which the applicant had the influential interest:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>i</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>Been declared by a court of law to be a nuisance, as defined under the Revised Judicature Act; or</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>Been subject to a court order of closure or padlocking. The information provided pursuant to paragraphs (1) through (8) of this subsection shall be supplemented in writing by certified mail, return receipt requested, to the Township Clerk within ten (10) working days of a change of circumstances which would render the information originally submitted false or incomplete.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(b)</designator>

<form.text>If a person who wishes to operate the business is an individual, the person shall sign the application. If a person who wishes to operate a business is other than an individual, each person with an influential interest in the business shall sign the application for a license as applicant.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(c)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>The information provided by an applicant in connection with an application for a license under this article shall be maintained by the Township Clerk's Office and all personal information shall be deemed confidential and may be disclosed only as required by law or by court order.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(a)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>All smoking lounges operating pursuant to a valid certificate of occupancy on the effective date of this ordinance are hereby granted a de facto temporary license to continue operating for a period of one hundred and eighty (180) days following the effective date. During this period all smoking lounge businesses shall apply for a license pursuant to this article; and by the expiration date of the one hundred and eighty (180) days shall conform to all requirements for issuance of a license.</form.text>
</form.para>

<form.item>
<name.block>

<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">

</name.block>

<form.unit>

<designator>(1)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">

</form.para>

<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(2)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">

</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(3)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>The applicant does not have a valid State issued exemption certificate, the State has denied the application for a transfer, or the exemption has been revoked;</form.text>
</form.para>

<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(4)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>The subject premise's lacks a current certificate of occupancy or does not comply with applicable building, zoning, plumbing, mechanical, electrical, health, or fire prevention codes. Upon filing an application for a building permit, plan review, or certificate of occupancy, the applicant shall also file a copy with the Township Clerk;</form.text>
</form.para>

<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(5)</designator>
</name.block>

<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(6)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">

</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">

<form.item>
<name.block>

</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>The business does not own the premises for which a license is sought or does not have a lease for the full period for which the license is sought;</form.text>

<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(9)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>An applicant has had a smoking exemption revoked, or not renewed for cause, in the last seven (7) years under this article or a comparable city or township ordinance or state law, whether in <inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of state__rsqb__</inline.instr> or otherwise;</form.text>

</name.block>

<form.text>Any business in which the applicant has had an influential interest, has, in the previous seven (7) years, and at the time during which the applicant had the influential interest:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>i</designator>
</name.block>

The business license shall be posted in a conspicuous place at or near the entrance to the business so that it may be read at any time.</form.text>

<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>Filing an application for a smoking lounge shall constitute consent to inspection by Township officials as provided herein, for the purpose of ensuring compliance with the specific regulations of this article. The Township shall inspect all portions of the premises where patrons are permitted, during times when the business is occupied by patrons or is open to the public. This section shall be narrowly construed by the Township to authorize reasonable inspections of the licensed premises pursuant to this article.</form.text>
</form.para>

<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(a)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>A licensee shall not transfer the license to another, nor shall a licensee operate a smoking lounge under the authority of a license at any place other than the address designated in the smoking lounge license application. Any transfer shall be grounds for suspension and revocation. A proposed transfer shall require a new application be filed and shall be subject to the same procedures, standards and fees required for a new license. Each location operated by a licensee requires a separate license.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>

</form.para>

<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>Each license shall expire annually on the 31st day of March unless otherwise suspended or revoked. Such license may be renewed only by making application and payment of the fee as required by this article.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.para>
<form.text>DIVISION 3 DENIAL, SUSPENSION, REVOCATION, HEARING</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>In the event the Township Clerk issues a written notice to deny for failure to comply with the requirements of section 2.3, the provisions of section 3.4 providing for an appeal hearing shall apply.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>The Township Clerk shall suspend the license for a period of thirty (30) days if the licensee has knowingly violated this article or has knowingly allowed an employee to violate this article. Upon receiving notice of a violation, the Clerk shall issue a written notice to suspend, which shall include the grounds for the suspension, the effective date of the suspension, and that the licensee may within twenty (20) days, request in writing, an appeal hearing before the Township Board pursuant to the provisions of section 3.4. The suspension shall take effect twenty-one (21) days after the date of the notice of suspension.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(a)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>The Township Clerk shall issue a written notice of revocation if the licensee knowingly violates this article or has knowingly allowed an employee to violate this article and the licensee's license has been suspended within the previous twelve (12) month period.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(b)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>The Township Clerk shall issue written notice to revoke or non renewal of the license if:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(1)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>The licensee would not meet the standards set forth in section 2.3 if the licensee were an applicant for a new license.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(2)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>The licensee has knowingly or recklessly allowed two (2) or more violations of the regulations of this article in the preceding twelve (12) month period.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(3)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>The licensee has knowingly or recklessly allowed a nuisance, to be maintained upon the premises.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(4)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>The subject premises have existing violations of building, zoning, plumbing, mechanical, electrical, health or fire prevention codes.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(5)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>The operation of the licensed establishment has resulted in a pattern of patron conduct in the neighborhood of the establishment that substantially disturbs the peace, order, and tranquility of the neighborhood.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(6)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>The licensee has failed to maintain the grounds and exterior of the licensee's establishment by allowing litter, debris, and/or refuse to unreasonably remain on the property or adjoining properties.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(7)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>The licensee knowingly or recklessly operated the business during a period of time when the license was suspended.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(8)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>The licensee has knowingly or recklessly engaged in illegal activity or allowed any illegal activity to occur in or on the licensed premises.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(c)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>The fact that any relevant conviction is being appealed shall have no effect on the revocation/nonrenewal of the license, provided that, if any conviction which serves as a basis of a license revocation/nonrenewal is overturned or reversed on appeal, that conviction shall be treated as null and of no effect and the license shall be reinstated.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(d)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>The revocation/nonrenewal shall not take effect for twenty-one (21) days from the date of the notice of revocation/nonrenewal.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(e)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>The written notice to revoke/nonrenewal, shall include the grounds for the revocation/nonrenewal, the effective date of the revocation/nonrenewal, and that the licensee may request in writing, within twenty (20) days of the date of the notice of suspension, or revocation/nonrenewal, an appeal hearing before the Township Board pursuant to the provisions of section 3.4. If not appealed, the suspension shall take effect twenty-one (21) days after the date of the notice of suspension.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(a)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>Upon receipt of a request for appeal, the Township Board shall provide the licensee with notice and an opportunity to be heard. The Township Board shall serve notice upon the licensee by certified mail, not less than twenty (20) days prior to the hearing date. The notice shall state:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(1)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>The date, time and place of the hearing.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(2)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>A statement that the licensee may present evidence and testimony, and may be represented by an attorney.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(b)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>The hearing shall be conducted by the Township Board and shall be open to the public. The Township Board shall submit to the licensee a written statement of its findings, decision, specific grounds for its decision, and a statement that the decision may be appealed to a court of competent jurisdiction.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.para>
<form.text>DIVISION 4 REGULATIONS</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>Businesses operating a licensed smoking lounge shall be closed between the hours of 2:00 a.m. and 8:00 a.m. on any day.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>The licensee, or the local agent designated in the application, shall remain on the premises while open for business to supervise the activities and shall be responsible to ensure compliance with the regulations of this article. In the event a licensee changes the local agent, the licensee shall immediately notify the Clerk in writing of the name and business address of the new local agent.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>Mechanical ventilation shall be supplied in compliance with the <inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of state__rsqb__</inline.instr> Mechanical Code to ensure sufficient ventilation of the smoking lounge. The recirculation and the natural ventilation of air from the smoking lounge is prohibited; and the air supplied to the smoking lounge shall be exhausted and discharged to an approved location in compliance with the <inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of state__rsqb__</inline.instr> Mechanical Code.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>Off-street parking shall be provided for the smoking lounge business. The minimum amount of parking shall be calculated by utilizing the parking requirements listed for sit down restaurants contained in section <inline.instr>__lsqb__statutory section__rsqb__</inline.instr> of the Zoning Ordinance.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>Storage lockers shall be prohibited on the premises of a smoking lounge, except that on-site humidors may be permitted in the smoking area of a cigar bar.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>There shall not be any outdoor activities, outdoor public admission events, or outdoor seating. The business activities shall be conducted wholly indoors. In no event shall designated on-site parking areas be used for any other purpose than parking of passenger vehicles. To ensure that the smoke is contained within the smoking area, all windows and doors shall remain closed to ensure that the smoke does not infiltrate nonsmoking areas and is not emitted to passersby.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>It shall be the duty of the licensee or the designated local agent to:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(a)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>Post conspicuous signs stating that no loitering is permitted on the premises; no minors are permitted on the premises; and patrons must leave the parking area immediately upon close of the business;</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(b)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>Designate one (1) or more employees to monitor, while the premises are open for business, the activities of persons on the premises by visually inspecting the interior and exterior of the premises at least once every ninety (90) minutes or inspecting the premises by use of video cameras and monitoring;</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(c)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>Ensure lighting of the exterior premises is provided, including all parking areas, for visual inspection and security. All exterior lighting shall comply with all provisions of Section <inline.instr>__lsqb__statutory section__rsqb__</inline.instr> of the Zoning Ordinance;</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(d)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>The licensee shall ensure that patrons are not parking in adjacent or neighboring parking lots or in residential areas that are not part of the parking area approved on the site plan for the licensed premises.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>The licensee or local agent, shall be responsible to maintain the premises to ensure there is not a violation of the Code of Ordinances, for disturbing the peace. If the licensee or designated local agent is convicted for a violation of <inline.instr>__lsqb__statutory section__rsqb__</inline.instr>, the conviction shall be grounds for revocation, denial or suspension of a license.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>It is unlawful for a licensee or local agent to knowingly violate the following regulations or to knowingly allow an employee, patron or any other person to violate the following regulations. The licensee or local agent shall remove anyone violating the following regulations:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(a)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>No one shall be allowed on the premises of a smoking lounge business unless the individual is eighteen (18) years of age or older. The licensee and local agent shall ensure that identifications of individuals on the premises have been checked to determine that every individual is eighteen (18) years of age or older before entry into the premises. The exit doors shall be monitored to ensure that no one is attempting to gain secret entry into the premises. A sign shall be posted near the entrance stating “No one under the age of eighteen (18) allowed.”</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(b)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>No person shall sell, offer for sale, trade, provide, allow, possess, consume or attempt to consume any alcoholic liquor on the premises unless the licensee has obtained the appropriate license from the Liquor Control Commission pursuant to <inline.instr>__lsqb__statutory section__rsqb__</inline.instr>.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(c)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>No one shall be allowed on the premises of a smoking lounge business to appear nude or in a state of nudity as defined in section 1.2 of this article.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(d)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>No person shall sell, offer for sale, trade, provide, allow, possess, consume or attempt to consume any controlled substance on the premises in violation of <inline.instr>__lsqb__statutory section__rsqb__</inline.instr>.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.para>
<form.text>DIVISION 6 PENALTIES AND ENFORCEMENT</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(a)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="94c763f0b7ba11efb3499aa8422d3018|60|40:43.50">
<form.text>A person who violates or fails to comply with any of the provisions of this article shall be guilty of a misdemeanor, punishable by a maximum fine of five hundred dollars ($500) and/or a maximum of ninety (90) days imprisonment. Each day a violation is committed, or permitted to continue, it shall constitute a separate offense and shall be treated as a separate offense.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(b)</designator>
</name.block>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</para>

<designator>40:44</designator>
<name>Comprehensive second-hand smoke ordinance</name>
</outline.name.block>
<online.view>

<online.view.item>LGV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>ORD</online.view.item>
